ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS

block.text: 1 KORIN

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 1
Paul, called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, and our brother Sosthenes,

block.text: Mi Pol, mi aposel bilong Krais Jisas. Long laik bilong God yet, em i mekim mi i kamap aposel. Mi wantaim brata Sostenes

ReferenceBlocks.text: to the assembly of God which is at Corinth; those who are sanctified in Christ Jesus. To those who are called to be saints, with all who call on the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place, both theirs and ours:

block.text: mitupela i raitim dispela pas long yupela ol manmeri bilong sios bilong God i stap long taun Korin. Krais Jisas i bin mekim yupela i kamap holi, na i makim yupela i bilong em yet. Em i makim yupela wantaim olgeta man long olgeta ples ol i save lotu na prea long nem bilong Jisas Krais, Bikpela bilong yumi. Em i Bikpela bilong ol na bilong yumi wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: God Papa bilong yumi wantaim Bikpela Jisas Krais i ken marimari long yupela na mekim bel bilong yupela i stap isi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I always thank my God concerning you, for the grace of God which was given you in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Long han bilong Krais Jisas, God i bin marimari long yupela na mekim gut long yupela, olsem na oltaim mi save tingting long yupela na tenkyu long God bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He has made your lives rich in every way, in all speech and all knowledge.

block.text: He has made your lives rich in every way, in all speech and all knowledge.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This shows that the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you.

block.text: This shows that the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You have the gifts of the Holy Spirit that you need as you wait for the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: Olsem na nau yupela i wetim Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais bai i kamap ples klia, na yupela i no sot long wanpela presen bilong Holi Spirit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Christ will also confirm you until the end, blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: Jisas Krais bai i strongim yupela, na bai yupela i stap strong inap long las de, na bai yupela i no gat asua long De bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God is faithful, through whom you were called into the fellowship of his Son, Jesus Christ, our Lord.

block.text: God i bin singautim yupela bilong yupela i stap wanbel wantaim Pikinini bilong en Jisas Krais, em Bikpela bilong yumi. Na God bai inapim tru olgeta samting em i bin tok long mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I beg you, brothers, through the name of our Lord, Jesus Christ, that you all speak the same thing and that there be no divisions among you. Be perfected together in the same mind and in the same judgment.

block.text: Ol brata, long nem bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais mi tokaut strong long yupela olsem, yupela olgeta i mas wanbel long ol toktok yupela i mekim. Yupela i no ken bruk nabaut. Yupela i mas i stap wanlain tru long wankain tingting na wankain laik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it has been reported to me concerning you, my brothers, by those who are from Chloe's household, that there are contentions among you.

block.text: Ol brata bilong mi, ol lain bilong Kloe ol i bin tokim mi olsem yupela i gat kros i stap namel long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I mean this, that each one of you says, “I follow Paul,” “I follow Apollos,” “I follow Cephas,” and, “I follow Christ.”

block.text: Mi tok long dispela pasin bilong tok pait i stap namel long yupela olgeta. Sampela i save tok, "Mi bilong Pol." Na sampela i tok, "Mi bilong Apolos." Na sampela i tok, "Mi bilong Pita." Na sampela i tok, "Mi bilong Krais."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Is Christ divided? Was Paul crucified for you? Or were you baptized into the name of Paul?

block.text: Olsem wanem? Ating Krais i bruk hap hap, a? Ating mi Pol mi bin i dai long diwai kros bilong helpim yupela, a? Ating yupela i bin kisim baptais long nem bilong mi Pol, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: I thank God that I baptized none of you, except Crispus and Gaius,

block.text: Namel long yupela mi bin baptaisim Krispus tupela Gaius tasol, na narapela man nogat. Long dispela mi tenkyu long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: so that no one should say that I had baptized you into my own name.

block.text: Olsem na i no gat wanpela man inap tok olsem, "Mipela i bin kisim baptais long nem bilong Pol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: (I also baptized the household of Stephanas; besides them, I don't know whether I baptized any other.)

block.text: Tru, mi bin baptaisim narapela lain tu, em ol lain i stap long haus bilong Stefanas. Na mi baptaisim ol arapela tu, o nogat, em mi no save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For Christ sent me not to baptize, but to preach the Good News--not in wisdom of words, so that the cross of Christ wouldn't be made void.

block.text: Krais i no bin salim mi bilong baptaisim ol man. Nogat. Em i salim mi bilong autim gutnius. Na mi no ken autim long kain smatpela tok ol saveman i save mekim. Nogat. Nogut mi mekim diwai kros bilong Krais em i kamap olsem samting nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the word of the cross is foolishness to those who are dying, but to us who are saved it is the power of God.
For it is written,

block.text: Tru, ol man i laik lus, ol i save ting tok bilong diwai kros em i kranki toktok tasol. Tasol yumi manmeri God i wok long kisim bek yumi, yumi save, tok bilong diwai kros em i strong bilong God.
Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, I will bring the discernment of the discerning to nothing.”

block.text: "Bai mi rausim save bilong ol man i gat gutpela tingting na bai mi pinisim save bilong ol saveman."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Where is the wise? Where is the scribe? Where is the lawyer of this world? Hasn't God made foolish the wisdom of this world?

block.text: Orait nau bai yumi tok wanem long ol gutpela tingting na save bilong ol saveman bilong dispela graun? Bai yumi tok wanem long ol man i save tumas long lo bilong Moses? Na long ol man i save tumas long pait long toktok? God i bin mekim olgeta save bilong ol man bilong dispela graun i kamap olsem kranki toktok tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For seeing that in the wisdom of God, the world through its wisdom didn't know God. It was God's good pleasure through the foolishness of the preaching to save those who believe.

block.text: Long gutpela tingting na save bilong en, God i save olsem, long save bilong ol yet ol man bilong graun i no inap kisim save long em. Olsem na God i makim narapela rot bilong em i ken kisim bek ol, em dispela "kranki toktok" mipela i save autim. Ol man i harim dispela toktok na ol i bilip long God, orait God i save kisim bek ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For Jews require a sign, Greeks seek after wisdom.

block.text: Ol Juda i save strong tumas long lukim ol mirakel, na ol Grik i wok strong long kisim gutpela tingting na save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we preach Christ crucified; a stumbling block to Jews, and foolishness to Greeks,

block.text: Tasol mipela i save autim tok bilong Krais i dai pinis long diwai kros, na dispela tok i olsem tok nogut long tingting bilong ol Juda. Na ol Grik i ting dispela em i kranki toktok tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However, to those who are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ is the power of God and the wisdom of God.

block.text: Tasol yumi ol manmeri i bin harim singaut bilong God, yumi Juda na Grik wantaim, yumi save, Krais em i strong bilong God, na em i save bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men, and the weakness of God is stronger than men.

block.text: Ol man bilong graun i save ting olsem, sampela tingting bilong God i kranki tru. Tasol dispela tingting i winim tru save bilong ol man. Na ol i save ting, sampela pasin bilong God i soim olsem God i no gat strong. Tasol ol dispela pasin bilong en i gat bikpela strong na i winim tru strong bilong ol man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you see your calling, brothers, that not many are wise according to the flesh, not many mighty, and not many noble;

block.text: Ol brata, yupela i mas tingim taim God i bin singautim yupela na yupela i kamap Kristen. Planti bilong yupela i no bin i stap olsem saveman long ai bilong ol man bilong dispela graun. Na planti bilong yupela i no bin i gat strong. Na planti bilong yupela i no bilong ol lain famili i gat biknem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

block.text: Tasol ol man God i makim, em ol man i gat kranki tingting long ai bilong ol arapela man, na long dispela pasin God i semim tru ol saveman bilong dispela graun. Na ol man ol arapela i save lukim olsem man i no gat strong, em God i bin kisim bilong semim ol man i gat strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and God chose the lowly things of the world, and the things that are despised, and the things that are not, that he might bring to nothing the things that are:

block.text: Na em i kisim ol man i no gat nem long dispela graun, em ol man ol arapela i save lukim olsem ol rabis samting na olsem ol samting nating. Na long dispela pasin God i save mekim ol man i gat biknem na strong i kamap olsem samting nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In that way, no flesh should boast before God.

block.text: Olsem na i no gat wanpela man i ken litimapim nem bilong em yet long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But of him, you are in Christ Jesus, who was made to us wisdom from God, and righteousness and sanctification, and redemption:

block.text: God yet i bin putim yupela i stap wantaim Krais Jisas. Na em i bin putim Krais i stap as bilong gutpela tingting na save bilong yumi. Na long Krais tasol God i mekim yumi i kamap stretpela manmeri na i mekim yumi i wokabaut long pasin bilong em yet. Na long wok bilong Krais tasol God i baim bek yumi na sin i no bosim yumi moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that, according as it is written,

block.text: Olsem na God i laik bai yumi mekim pasin olsem buk bilong God i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He who boasts, let him boast in the Lord.”

block.text: "Man i laik amamas, em i mas amamas long Bikpela tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 2
When I came to you, brothers, I didn't come with excellence of speech or of wisdom, proclaiming to you the testimony of God.

block.text: Ol brata, taim mi bin i kam long yupela na mi autim tok hait bilong God long yupela, mi no bin mekim ol kain kain bikpela toktok olsem ol saveman i save mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I determined not to know anything among you, except Jesus Christ, and him crucified.

block.text: Mi bin ting olsem, taim mi stap namel long yupela, mi no ken tingting long narapela samting. Nogat. Mi mas tingting long Jisas Krais tasol. Yes, long Jisas Krais i bin i dai long diwai kros.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was with you in weakness, in fear, and in much trembling.

block.text: Na taim mi stap wantaim yupela, mi no gat strong. Nogat. Mi save pret, na mi guria planti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: My speech and my preaching were not in persuasive words of human wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power.

block.text: Na tok mi bin mekim na gutnius mi bin autim, em mi no mekim long pasin bilong ol saveman, bai bikpela save bilong mi i ken senisim tingting bilong yupela. Nogat. Mi bin soim strong bilong Holi Spirit long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That way, your faith wouldn't stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.

block.text: Mi bin mekim olsem, long wanem, mi no laik bai save bilong man i kamapim bilip bilong yupela. Nogat. Mi laik bai strong bilong God tasol i kamapim dispela bilip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We speak wisdom, however, among those who are full grown; yet a wisdom not of this world, nor of the rulers of this world, who are coming to nothing.

block.text: Tru, ol man i kamap strongpela pinis long pasin bilong God, ol i save kisim save long tok mipela i autim. Tasol dispela save ol i kisim em i no kain save bilong ol man bilong graun. Na em i no kain save bilong ol hetman bilong dispela graun, em ol lain i laik lus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we speak God's wisdom in a mystery, the wisdom that has been hidden, which God foreordained before the worlds for our glory.

block.text: Nogat. Mipela i autim tok long gutpela tingting na save bilong God. Taim God i no wokim graun yet, na long save bilong em, em i bin makim rot bilong mekim yumi i sindaun gut wantaim em long heven. Tasol tok bilong dispela rot i bin i stap hait,

ReferenceBlocks.text: None of the rulers of this world has understood. For had they known it, they wouldn't have crucified the Lord of glory.
But as it is written,

block.text: na i no gat wanpela hetman bilong dispela graun i bin save long en. Nogat. Sapos ol i bin save, orait ol i no inap kisim Bikpela bilong heven na nilim em long diwai kros.
Tasol mipela i tok long ol dispela samting buk bilong God i gat tok long en olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Things which an eye didn't see, and an ear didn't hear, which didn't enter into the heart of man, these God has prepared for those who love him.”

block.text: "ol samting bipo i no gat man i bin lukim o harim tok long en, na i no bin kamap long tingting bilong man tu, em ol samting God i bin redim i stap bilong ol man i save laikim em tru."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But to us, God revealed them through the Spirit. For the Spirit searches all things, yes, the deep things of God.

block.text: Tok bilong ol dispela samting i bin i stap hait, tasol long wok bilong Spirit bilong em yet, God i bin kamapim long mipela. Holi Spirit i save lukluk gut long olgeta samting, na em i save lukim tu olgeta tingting hait bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For who among men knows the things of a man, except the spirit of the man, which is in him? Even so, no one knows the things of God, except God's Spirit.

block.text: I no gat man i save long tingting bilong narapela man. Nogat. Spirit bilong dispela man yet, em i stap insait long em, em tasol i save. Olsem tasol, i no gat wanpela man i save long tingting bilong God. Spirit bilong God yet, em tasol i save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we received, not the spirit of the world, but the Spirit which is from God, that we might know the things that were freely given to us by God.

block.text: Na mipela i no bin kisim spirit bilong dispela graun. Nogat. Mipela i kisim Spirit i kam long God, bai mipela i ken save long olgeta presen God i bin givim long mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Which things also we speak, not in words which man's wisdom teaches, but which the Holy Spirit teaches, comparing spiritual things with spiritual things.

block.text: Mipela i save tokaut long ol dispela presen. Tasol tok bilong mipela i no kam long save bilong man. Nogat. Holi Spirit yet i bin skulim mipela, na mipela i mekim dispela tok. Mipela i save autim tok bilong Holi Spirit long ol man Holi Spirit i stap long ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now the natural man doesn't receive the things of God's Spirit, for they are foolishness to him. He can't know them, because they are spiritually discerned.

block.text: Tasol man i no gat Holi Spirit, em i no inap kisim ol presen bilong Spirit bilong God, long wanem, em i save ting ol dispela presen i kranki samting tasol. Yumi save kisim ol dispela presen long Holi Spirit tasol, olsem na ol man i gat Holi Spirit, ol tasol inap skelim na save tru long ol dispela presen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who is spiritual discerns all things, and he himself is judged by no one.

block.text: Man i gat Holi Spirit, em i save skelim olgeta samting. Tasol i no gat wanpela man em inap long skelim pasin bilong man i gat Holi Spirit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “For who has known the mind of the Lord, that he should instruct him?”

block.text: Buk bilong God i gat tok olsem, "Husat i save long tingting bilong Bikpela, bai em inap long skulim Bikpela?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: But we have Christ's mind.

block.text: Tasol tingting bilong Krais i stap long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 3
Brothers, I couldn't speak to you as to spiritual, but as to fleshly, as to babies in Christ.

block.text: Ol brata, bipo mi no inap givim tok long yupela olsem mi save givim long ol man i save bihainim Holi Spirit. Nogat. Mi bin givim tok long yupela olsem mi save givim long ol man i bihainim pasin bilong olpela bel. Long dispela taim yupela i bin i stap yet olsem ol pikinini long pasin bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I fed you with milk, not with meat; for you weren't yet ready. Indeed, not even now are you ready.

block.text: Mi bin givim susu long yupela. Mi no bin givim strongpela kaikai long yupela, long wanem, yupela i no redi yet long kisim strongpela kaikai. Na nau tu yupela i no redi yet,

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are still fleshly. For insofar as there is jealousy, strife, and factions among you, aren't you fleshly, and don't you walk in the ways of men?

block.text: long wanem, yupela i bihainim yet pasin bilong olpela bel. Yes, pasin bilong bel nogut long ol brata na tok pait, em i stap yet long yupela. Na ol dispela pasin yupela i save mekim, ol i pasin bilong olpela bel. Ol i pasin bilong ol man bilong graun tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For when one says, “I follow Paul,” and another, “I follow Apollos,” aren't you fleshly?

block.text: Wanpela man i save tok, "Mi bilong Pol." Na narapela i tok, "Mi bilong Apolos." Long dispela pasin yupela i stap olsem ol man bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Who then is Apollos, and who is Paul, but servants through whom you believed; and each as the Lord gave to him?

block.text: Yupela tingim gut. Apolos em i husat? Mi Pol, mi husat? Mitupela i wokman tasol. Bikpela i givim narapela narapela wok long mitupela, na long dispela wok bilong mitupela yupela i bin bilip long Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I planted. Apollos watered. But God gave the increase.

block.text: Mi bin planim pikinini bilong kaikai. Apolos em i bin givim wara long en. Tasol God i bin mekim kaikai i kamap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then neither he who plants is anything, nor he who waters, but God who gives the increase.

block.text: Olsem na man i planim pikinini kaikai, em i no gat nem. Na man i givim wara, em tu i no gat nem. Nogat. God i save mekim kaikai i kamap, em wanpela tasol i gat nem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now he who plants and he who waters are the same, but each will receive his own reward according to his own labor.

block.text: Man i planim pikinini kaikai na man i givim wara, tupela wantaim i mekim wok bilong God. Na tupela wan wan bai I kisim pe inap long wok tupela i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we are God's fellow workers. You are God's farming, God's building.

block.text: Mitupela i wanwok bilong God, na yupela i olsem gaden bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: According to the grace of God which was given to me, as a wise master builder I laid a foundation, and another builds on it. But let each man be careful how he builds on it.

block.text: Long marimari bilong God mi kamap olsem kamda i gat gutpela save tru bilong wokim haus, na mi lainim ol ston bilong wokim haus antap long en. Na narapela man i wokim haus antap long ol dispela ston mi bin lainim. Orait olgeta man i mas lukaut gut long pasin ol i wokim haus long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For no one can lay any other foundation than that which has been laid, which is Jesus Christ.

block.text: Yupela i save, God i putim pinis Jisas Krais olsem namba wan ston bilong haus, na i no gat wanpela man inap long putim narapela ston bilong wokim haus antap long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If any man builds on this foundation using gold, silver, costly stones, wood, hay or straw,

block.text: Na taim ol man i wokim haus antap long dispela ston, ating sampela bai i wokim long gol, na sampela bai i wokim long silva, na sampela bai i wokim long ol ston i dia tumas, na sampela bai i wokim long diwai, na sampela bai i wokim long kunai, na sampela bai i wokim long ol bun bilong wit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: his work will be shown for what it is, because the Day will bring it to light. It will be revealed with fire; and the fire itself will test what sort of work each man's work is.

block.text: Orait bihain wok bilong olgeta man bai i kamap ples klia long de God i makim bilong kotim ol manmeri. Dispela de bai i kamap olsem paia, na dispela paia bai i traim wok bilong olgeta man wan wan, bilong painimaut wok bilong ol i gutpela o nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If any man's work remains which he built on it, he will receive a reward.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i wokim haus antap long dispela ston, na haus bilong en i no paia, orait dispela wokman bai i kisim pe.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If any man's work is burned, he will suffer loss, but he himself will be saved, but as through fire.

block.text: Tasol sapos haus bilong wanpela wokman em i paia olgeta, orait olgeta wok bilong dispela man bai i lus. Wokman yet bai i no inap lus, tasol em bai i stap olsem man yumi kisim bek long paia.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you know that you are a temple of God, and that God's Spirit lives in you?

block.text: Yupela i haus bilong God yet, na Spirit bilong God i stap insait long yupela. Ating yupela i no save long dispela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone destroys the temple of God, God will destroy him; for God's temple is holy, which you are.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i bagarapim haus bilong God, orait God bai i bagarapim dispela man, long wanem, haus bilong God em i samting God i makim bilong em yet. Na dispela haus, em yupela tasol

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let no one deceive himself. If anyone thinks that he is wise among you in this world, let him become a fool, that he may become wise.

block.text: Nogut yupela i giamanim yupela yet. Sapos wanpela man namel long yupela em i save long ol samting bilong dispela graun na em i tingting olsem, "Mi gat gutpela save tru," orait mobeta em i kamap longlong man pastaim, na bai em i ken kamap saveman tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written,

block.text: Long wanem, gutpela save bilong dispela graun em i olsem longlong pasin tasol long ai bilong God. Buk bilong God i tok olsem long dispela,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “He has taken the wise in their craftiness.”

block.text: "Sampela man i save tingting long ol kain kain pasin bilong mekim nogut long ol arapela man, tasol God i save mekim ol dispela pasin bilong ol i bagarapim ol yet."

ReferenceBlocks.text: And again,

block.text: Na buk bilong God i tok tu olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The Lord knows the reasoning of the wise, that it is worthless.”

block.text: "Bikpela i save pinis long tingting bilong ol saveman. Em i save, olgeta samting ol i tingting long mekim, ol bai i no inap kamap."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore let no one boast in men. For all things are yours.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas lusim pasin bilong apim nem bilong ol man. Olgeta samting i bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Paul, Apollos, Cephas, the world, life, death, things present, and things to come ae all yours.

block.text: Pol na Apolos na Pita na dispela graun na laip na dai na ol samting i stap nau na ol samting bai i kamap bihain, olgeta i bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You belong to Christ and Christ belongs to God.

block.text: Na yupela i bilong Krais. Na Krais em i bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 4
So let a man think of us as Christ's servants, and stewards of God's mysteries.

block.text: Yupela i mas ting olsem mipela i wokman bilong Krais na mipela i gat wok bilong lukautim gut ol tok hait bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Here, moreover, it is required of stewards, that they be found faithful.

block.text: Orait man i mekim wok bilong wanpela man, em i mas bihainim gut tok bilong bikman bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged by you, or by man's judgment. Yes, I don't judge my own self.

block.text: Olsem na sapos yupela i laik skelim pasin bilong mi, o sapos ol man i laik skelim pasin bilong mi long kot, bai mi no wari liklik. Mi tu mi no save skelim pasin bilong mi yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I know nothing against myself. Yet I am not justified by this, but he who judges me is the Lord.

block.text: Tru, mi no save long wanpela rong bilong mi, tasol mi no inap tok olsem, "Mi stretpela man." Wok bilong skelim mi, em i wok bilong Bikpela tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore judge nothing before the time, until the Lord comes, who will both bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and reveal the counsels of the hearts. Then each man will get his praise from God.

block.text: Taim bilong kot i no yet, olsem na yupela i no ken skelim pasin bilong ol arapela man. Yupela i mas wetim Bikpela i kam. Em bai i kisim olgeta samting i hait i stap long tudak na putim long lait. Na em bai i kamapim ples klia tingting bilong olgeta man. Na long dispela taim God bai i tokim yumi olgeta wan wan long wok bilong yumi em i gutpela, o nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now these things, brothers, I have in a figure transferred to myself and Apollos for your sakes, that in us you might learn not to think beyond the things which are written, that none of you be puffed up against one another.

block.text: Ol brata, mi laik helpim tingting bilong yupela, olsem na mi mekim ol dispela tok long mitupela Apolos. Yupela i ken ting long mitupela na bihainim pasin i stret olsem buk bilong God i tok long en, na yupela i no ken kalapim dispela tok. Olsem na yupela i no ken bikhet na litimapim nem bilong wanpela na daunim nem bilong narapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For who makes you different? And what do you have that you didn't receive? But if you did receive it, why do you boast as if you had not received it?

block.text: Pren, olsem wanem? Husat i putim yu i stap bikman? Yu gat wanpela gutpela samting yu no bin kisim long God, a? Na sapos i tru yu bin kisim olgeta samting long han bilong God, orait bilong wanem yu litimapim nem bilong yu yet, olsem yu yet yu bin kamapim ol dispela samting?

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are already filled. You have already become rich. You have come to reign without us. Yes, and I wish that you did reign, that we also might reign with you.

block.text: O yes, ating yupela i pulap pinis long ol gutpela samting. Ating yupela i gat olgeta samting na yupela i stap gut tru. Ating yupela i winim mipela pinis na i kamap olsem ol king. O sori, mi laikim tumas bai yupela i stap king tru, bai mipela tu i ken i stap king wantaim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For, I think that God has displayed us, the apostles, last of all, like men sentenced to death. For we are made a spectacle to the world, both to angels and men.

block.text: Tasol nogat. Mi ting olsem, God i bin putim mipela aposel i stap las tru. Mipela i stap olsem ol man, kot i tok pinis long mipela i mas i dai, na ol i laik kilim mipela i dai long ai bilong olgeta manmeri na ol ensel wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We are fools for Christ's sake, but you are wise in Christ. We are weak, but you are strong. You have honor, but we have dishonor.

block.text: Bilong litimapim nem bilong Krais, mipela i stap olsem ol krankiman, tasol yupela i stap saveman long pasin bilong Krais. Mipela i no gat strong, tasol yupela i kamap strong pinis. Mipela i no gat nem, tasol yupela i gat biknem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even to this present hour we hunger, thirst, are naked, are beaten, and have no certain dwelling place.

block.text: Bipo tru na i kam inap nau, mipela i save stap hangre, na nek bilong mipela i drai tumas, na mipela i save putim ol klos i brukbruk pinis. Ol i save paitim mipela nabaut. Na mipela i no gat ples bilong sindaun gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We toil, working with our own hands. When people curse us, we bless. Being persecuted, we endure.

block.text: Mipela i save hatwok tru long han bilong mipela yet. Ol i save tok bilas long mipela, tasol mipela i save askim God long mekim gut long ol. Ol i save mekim nogut long mipela, na mipela i save pasim maus tasol na karim ol dispela hevi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Being defamed, we entreat. We are made as the filth of the world, the dirt wiped off by all, even until now.

block.text: Ol i save tok nogut tru long mipela, tasol mipela i save bekim gutpela tok long ol. Mipela i kamap olsem pipia ol man i bin tromoi. Long ai bilong olgeta man, mipela i stap olsem rabis samting i doti tru. Mipela i bin i stap olsem i kam inap nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I don't write these things to shame you, but to admonish you as my beloved children.

block.text: Mi no raitim dispela tok bilong semim yupela. Nogat. Mi raitim, long wanem, mi laikim tumas yupela ol pikinini bilong mi, na mi laik kliaim tingting bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For though you have ten thousand tutors in Christ, yet not many fathers. For in Christ Jesus, I became your father through the Good News.

block.text: Maski sapos yupela i gat 10,000 man bilong lukautim yupela long pasin bilong Krais, yupela i no gat planti papa. Nogat. Long pasin bilong Krais Jisas mi wanpela mi stap papa bilong yupela. Yupela i bin kamap pikinini bilong mi long taim mi bin autim gutnius long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I beg you therefore, be imitators of me.

block.text: Olsem na mi laik kirapim yupela long lukim gut pasin bilong mi na bihainim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Because of this I have sent Timothy to you, who is my beloved and faithful child in the Lord. He will remind you of my ways which are in Christ, even as I teach everywhere in every assembly.

block.text: Long dispela as tasol mi bin salim Timoti i kam long yupela. Em i olsem pikinini bilong mi, na mi laikim em tru. Em i save lukautim gut wok bilong Bikpela. Bai em i kirapim gen tingting bilong yupela long ol pasin mi save mekim long i stap pas wantaim Krais, em ol pasin mi save skulim ol manmeri bilong olgeta sios long olgeta ples long bihainim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now some are puffed up, as though I were not coming to you.

block.text: Ating sampela bilong yupela i ting mi bai no inap i kam lukim yupela, na ol i bikhet nabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I will come to you shortly, if the Lord is willing. And I will know, not the word of those who are puffed up, but the power.

block.text: Tasol nogat. Sapos Bikpela i laik, orait mi bai i kam long yupela kwiktaim. Na taim mi kam, mi no kam bilong harim toktok bilong ol dispela bikhetman. Nogat. Mi kam bilong painimaut, ol i gat wanem kain strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.

block.text: Long wanem, kingdom bilong God em i no samting bilong toktok tasol. Nogat. Em i samting bilong pawa na strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What do you want? Shall I come to you with a rod, or in love and a spirit of gentleness?

block.text: Orait yupela i laik bai mi mekim wanem kain pasin? Ating yupela i laik bai mi kisim kanda na mi kam bilong stretim yupela? O yupela i laik bai mi givim bel bilong mi long yupela na mi kam wantaim sori na pasin isi?

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 5
It is actually reported that there is sexual immorality among you. Such sexual immorality as is not even named among the Gentiles, that one has his father's wife.

block.text: Mi harim ol i stori olsem, wanpela kain pasin pamuk i kamap namel long yupela, em kain pasin nogut tru ol haiden yet i no save mekim. Dispela pasin i olsem, wanpela man i bin kisim meri bilong papa bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You are puffed up, and didn't rather mourn, that he who had done this deed might be removed from among you.

block.text: Tasol yupela i ting yupela i nambawan tru na i winim ol arapela, a? Mobeta yupela i lusim dispela pasin bilong apim nem bilong yupela yet, na yupela i sori na krai. Mobeta yupela i rausim dispela man i bin mekim dispela pasin nogut, na bai em i no i stap moa wantaim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I most certainly, as being absent in body but present in spirit, have already, as though I were present, judged him who has done this thing.

block.text: Tru, bodi bilong mi em i stap longwe long yupela, tasol spirit bilong mi em i stap wantaim yupela. Na i olsem mi yet mi stap tru wantaim yupela, na mi skelim pinis pasin bilong dispela man i bin mekim dispela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, you being gathered together, and my spirit, with the power of our Lord Jesus Christ,

block.text: Olsem na mi tok, long nem bilong Jisas, Bikpela bilong yumi, yupela i mas mekim kibung. Na strong bilong Jisas, Bikpela bilong yumi, na spirit bilong mi tu bai i stap wantaim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: are to deliver such a one to Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.

block.text: Na yumi mas putim dispela man long han bilong Satan, bai bodi bilong en i ken bagarap. Yumi mekim olsem na long De bilong Bikpela bai God i ken kisim bek spirit bilong dispela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Your boasting is not good. Don't you know that a little yeast leavens the whole lump?

block.text: Yupela i save apim nem bilong yupela yet, na em i no gutpela pasin. Olsem wanem? Ating yupela i no save olsem, liklik yis tasol i save mekim olgeta bret i solap?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Purge out the old yeast, that you may be a new lump, even as you are unleavened. For indeed Christ, our Passover, has been sacrificed in our place.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas rausim olgeta olpela yis, bai yupela i ken i stap olsem nupela bret i no gat yis. Mi save, yupela i stap pinis olsem bret i no gat yis, long wanem, ol i ofaim pinis Krais, na em i olsem sipsip yumi ofaim long Bikpela De Bilong Tingim De God I Larim Ol Israel I Stap Gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore let us keep the feast, not with old yeast, neither with the yeast of malice and wickedness, but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.

block.text: Olsem na laip bilong yumi i mas bihainim pasin bilong ol man i redi long dispela bikpela de bilong lotu. Yumi mas rausim olgeta sin na pasin nogut long laip bilong yumi, olsem ol man i save rausim olgeta olpela yis long haus bilong ol long taim ol i laik redi long dispela bikpela de. Na yumi mas bihainim pasin bilong klinpela bel na tok tru, na dispela pasin bai i stap olsem nupela bret i no gat yis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I wrote to you in my letter to have no company with sexual sinners;

block.text: Long narapela pas mi bin raitim long yupela, mi bin tok olsem, "Yupela i no ken stap wantaim ol man bilong mekim pasin pamuk."

ReferenceBlocks.text: yet not at all meaning with the sexual sinners of this world. Nor with the covetous and extortioners, or with idolaters; for then you would have to leave the world.

block.text: Mi no bin tok long yupela i mas lusim tru olgeta man bilong dispela graun i save mekim pasin pamuk, na ol man i save mangal na stilim samting bilong ol arapela man, na ol man i save lotu long ol giaman god. Nogat. Sapos yupela i laik lusim tru ol dispela kain man, orait yupela i mas lusim dispela graun olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But as it is, I wrote to you not to associate with anyone who is called a brother who is a sexual sinner, or covetous, or an idolater, or a slanderer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner. Don't even eat with such a person.

block.text: Tasol as bilong tok mi bin raitim em i olsem. Sapos wanpela man yupela i save kolim brata long Krais, em i mekim pasin pamuk o em i mangal long ol samting bilong ol arapela man o em i lotu long ol giaman god o em i tok bilas o em i spak o em i stilim samting bilong narapela man, orait yupela i no ken i stap wantaim em. Nogat. Na tu, yupela i no ken kaikai wantaim kain man olsem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For what have I to do with also judging those who are outside? Don't you judge those who are within?

block.text: Olsem wanem? Ating mi gat wok bilong skelim pasin bilong ol man i stap ausait long sios, a? Nogat tru. Tasol wok bilong skelim pasin bilong ol man i stap insait long sios, em i wok bilong yupela stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But those who are outside, God judges. “Put away the wicked man from among yourselves.”

block.text: Ol man bilong ausait, God yet bai i skelim pasin bilong ol. Tasol buk bilong God i tok olsem, "Yupela i mas rausim dispela man nogut i stap namel long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 6
Dare any of you, having a matter against his neighbor, go to law before the unrighteous, and not before the saints?

block.text: Sapos wanpela namel long yupela em i gat tok long narapela, ating em i save kalapim ol manmeri bilong God na i go mekim kot long ai bilong ol haiden? Em i no gat sem long mekim dispela kain pasin, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you know that the saints will judge the world? And if the world is judged by you, are you unworthy to judge the smallest matters?

block.text: Ating yupela i no save olsem, yumi manmeri bilong God yumi bai i skelim pasin bilong olgeta manmeri bilong graun? Na sapos yumi bai i mekim olsem, orait bilong wanem yupela i no inap long skelim dispela kain liklik tok i kamap namel long yupela yet?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you know that we will judge angels? How much more, things that pertain to this life?

block.text: Na ating yupela i no save olsem yumi bai i skelim pasin bilong ol ensel tu? Orait sapos yumi bai i mekim olsem, ating yumi inap tru long skelim tok bilong ol samting bilong dispela graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If then, you have to judge things pertaining to this life, do you set them to judge who are of no account in the assembly?

block.text: Olsem na sapos yupela i gat tok i kamap namel long yupela, bilong wanem yupela i save givim wok bilong skelim dispela tok long man i no gat nem long sios?

ReferenceBlocks.text: I say this to move you to shame. Isn't there even one wise man among you who would be able to decide between his brothers?

block.text: Mi mekim dispela tok bilong semim yupela. Olsem wanem? Ating namel long yupela i no gat wanpela man i gat save inap long skelim tok i kamap namel long tupela brata?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But brother goes to law with brother, and that before unbelievers!

block.text: Orait bilong wanem wanpela brata i save bringim narapela brata i go long kot, na i kotim em long ai bilong ol man i no bilip long Krais?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore it is already altogether a defect in you, that you have lawsuits one with another. Why not rather be wronged? Why not rather be defrauded?

block.text: Yes, yupela i save bringim ol arapela manmeri bilong sios i go long kot, na dispela pasin bilong yupela i soim olsem yupela i pundaun pinis long bihainim pasin bilong Krais. Bilong wanem yupela i no larim ol i mekim nogut long yupela? Bilong wanem yupela i no larim ol i pulim ol samting bilong yupela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: No, but you yourselves do wrong, and defraud, and that against your brothers.

block.text: Tasol yupela i no laik bihainim ol dispela gutpela pasin. Nogat. Yupela yet i save mekim rong long ol arapela na pulim ol samting bilong ol. Na yupela i save mekim dispela pasin long ol brata bilong yupela yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or don't you know that the unrighteous will not inherit the Kingdom of God? Don't be deceived. Neither the sexually immoral, nor idolaters, nor adulterers, nor effeminate, nor homosexuals,

block.text: Ol man i save mekim pasin nogut, ol bai i no inap i go insait long kingdom bilong God. Ating yupela i no save long dispela, a? Nogut yupela i giamanim bel bilong yupela yet. Ol man i save mekim pasin pamuk, na ol man i save lotu long ol giaman god, na ol man i trabel long ol maritmeri, na ol man i save mekim ol kain kain pasin i gat sem wantaim ol arapela man,

ReferenceBlocks.text: nor thieves, nor covetous, nor drunkards, nor slanderers, nor extortioners, will inherit the Kingdom of God.

block.text: na ol stilman, na ol man i save mangal long ol samting bilong ol arapela man, na ol man i save spak, na ol man i save tok bilas long ol arapela man, na ol man i save pulim samting bilong ol arapela man, olgeta dispela kain man bai i no inap i go insait long kingdom bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Such were some of you, but you were washed. But you were sanctified. But you were justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and in the Spirit of our God.

block.text: Na bipo sampela bilong yupela i stap kain man olsem. Tasol God i wasim yupela pinis na mekim yupela i kamap lain manmeri bilong em stret. Yupela i kisim nem stretpela man pinis. Na long nem bilong Bikpela Jisas Krais na long strong bilong Spirit bilong God yet, God i mekim yupela i kamap stretpela manmeri long ai bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “All things are lawful for me,” but not all things are expedient. “All things are lawful for me,” but I will not be brought under the power of anything.

block.text: Sampela man i save tok, "Olgeta samting i orait long mi mekim." Dispela tok em i tru, tasol i no olgeta samting i save helpim yu long i stap gut. Olgeta samting i orait long mi mekim, tasol mi no ken larim wanpela samting i bosim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Foods for the belly, and the belly for foods,” but God will bring to nothing both it and them. But the body is not for sexual immorality, but for the Lord; and the Lord for the body.

block.text: Sampela man i save tok,"Kaikai em i bilong pulimapim bel, na bel em i bilong kisim kaikai." Dispela tok em i tru, tasol God bai i pinisim olkain kaikai na ol bodi bilong yumi wantaim. Na ol bodi bilong yumi, ol i no bilong mekim pasin pamuk. Nogat. Bodi em i bilong Bikpela. Na Bikpela em i bilong bodi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now God raised up the Lord, and will also raise us up by his power.

block.text: Long strong bilong em yet God i bin kirapim Bikpela long matmat,na em bai i kirapim yumi tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you know that your bodies are members of Christ? Shall I then take the members of Christ, and make them members of a prostitute? May it never be!

block.text: Ating yupela i no save olsem, ol bodi bilong yupela i hap hap bilong bodi bilong Krais? Olsem na sapos mi kisim ol hap bodi bilong Krais na mekim i kamap hap bodi bilong pamukmeri, dispela em i gutpela pasin, a? Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or don't you know that he who is joined to a prostitute is one body? For, “The two,” says he, “will become one flesh.”

block.text: Man i pas wantaim pamukmeri, em i kamap wanpela bodi wantaim em. Ating yupela i no save long dispela? Buk bilong God i tok olsem, "Tupela bai i kamap wanpela bodi tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who is joined to the Lord is one spirit.

block.text: Tasol sapos man i pas wantaim Bikpela, orait long spirit em i kamap wanpela wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Flee sexual immorality! “Every sin that a man does is outside the body,” but he who commits sexual immorality sins against his own body.

block.text: Oltaim yupela i mas i stap longwe long pasin pamuk. Olgeta arapela sin ol man i save mekim, ol i kamap ausait long bodi. Tasol man i mekim pasin pamuk, em i mekim nogut long bodi bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or don't you know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit which is in you, which you have from God? You are not your own.

block.text: Ating yupela i no save olsem, bodi bilong yupela em i haus bilong Holi Spirit. God i givim Spirit pinis long yupela, na em i stap insait long yupela. Yupela i no bilong yupela yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God bought you with a price. Therefore glorify God in your body and in your spirit, which are God's.

block.text: Nogat. God i bin baim bek yupela long bikpela pe tumas. Olsem na olgeta samting yupela i mekim long bodi bilong yupela, yupela i mas mekim bilong litimapim nem bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 7
Now concerning the things about which you wrote to me: it is good for a man not to touch a woman.

block.text: Nau mi laik bekim dispela tok yupela i bin raitim long pas. Sapos man i no marit, em i gutpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But, because of sexual immoralities, let each man have his own wife, and let each woman have her own husband.

block.text: Tasol pasin pamuk i wok long kamap bikpela, olsem na mobeta olgeta man wan wan i gat meri bilong ol yet, na olgeta meri wan wan i gat man bilong ol yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let the husband render to his wife the affection owed her, and likewise also the wife to her husband.

block.text: Bodi bilong man i bilong meri bilong en, na man i no ken pasim. Olsem tasol, bodi bilong meri i bilong man bilong en, na meri tu i no ken pasim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The wife doesn't have authority over her own body, but the husband. Likewise also the husband doesn't have authority over his own body, but the wife.

block.text: Meri i no bos bilong bodi bilong em yet. Nogat. Man bilong en em i bos. Na olsem tasol, man i no bos bilong bodi bilong em yet. Nogat. Meri bilong en em i bos.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't deprive one another, unless it is by consent for a season, that you may give yourselves to fasting and prayer. Then come together again, that Satan doesn't tempt you because of your lack of self-control.

block.text: Sapos yutupela i marit, orait wanpela i no ken givim baksait long arapela na pasim bodi bilong en. Tru, sapos yutupela i wanbel na i laik tambuim bodi long sotpela taim, bai yutupela i ken mekim wok bilong prea, orait dispela pasin em i orait. Tasol bihain yutupela i mas bungim bodi gen. Nogut yupela i no inap bosim laik bilong bodi bilong yupela yet, na Satan i traim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But this I say by way of concession, not of commandment.

block.text: Dispela tok mi mekim, em bilong helpim yupela tasol. Em i no i stap olsem lo yupela i mas bihainim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet I wish that all men were like me. However each man has his own gift from God, one of this kind, and another of that kind.

block.text: Mi laik bai olgeta manmeri inap i stap singel olsem mi. Tasol God i bin givim kain kain presen long olgeta man wan wan. Wanpela man i kisim wanpela kain presen, na narapela man i kisim narapela kain presen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I say to the unmarried and to widows, it is good for them if they remain even as I am.

block.text: Tasol long ol manmeri i no marit, na long ol meri man bilong ol i dai pinis, mi tok olsem. Sapos ol i stap singel olsem mi, em i gutpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if they don't have self-control, let them marry. For it's better to marry than to burn.

block.text: Tasol sapos ol i no inap bosim gut laik bilong bodi bilong ol yet, orait mobeta ol i marit. Nogut bel bilong ol i skrap long mekim pasin pamuk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But to the married I command--not I, but the Lord--that the wife not leave her husband,

block.text: Long ol manmeri i marit pinis, mi givim dispela lo. Em i no lo bilong mi yet. Nogat. Em i lo bilong Bikpela. Em i olsem. Meri i no ken lusim man bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: (but if she departs, let her remain unmarried, or else be reconciled to her husband), and that the husband not leave his wife.

block.text: Na sapos em i lusim man pinis, orait em i mas i stap nating. Sapos nogat, em i ken i go bek na wanbel gen wantaim man bilong en. Na man tu em i no ken rausim meri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But to the rest I--not the Lord--say, if any brother has an unbelieving wife, and she is content to live with him, let him not leave her.

block.text: Na mi yet mi gat tok long ol arapela. Dispela em i no tok bilong Bikpela. Mi tok olsem, sapos wanpela brata long Krais em i marit na meri bilong en i no bilip long Krais, na sapos meri i laik i stap wantaim em, orait dispela brata i no ken rausim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The woman who has an unbelieving husband, and he is content to live with her, let her not leave her husband.

block.text: Na sapos wanpela meri i marit na man bilong en i no bilip long Krais, na sapos man i laik i stap wantaim em, orait meri i no ken lusim man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the unbelieving husband is sanctified in the wife, and the unbelieving wife is sanctified in the husband. Otherwise your children would be unclean, but now they are holy.

block.text: Yupela i save, man i no bilip, em i pas wantaim meri bilong en, na long dispela pasin man i kamap holi. Na meri i no bilip, em i pas wantaim dispela brata, na long dispela pasin meri i kamap holi. Sapos nogat, orait ol pikinini bilong yupela bai i no inap i stap klin long ai bilong God. Tasol nau ol i stap holi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yet if the unbeliever departs, let there be separation. The brother or the sister is not under bondage in such cases, but God has called us in peace.

block.text: Tasol sapos man o meri i no bilip em i laik lusim meri o man bilong en, i orait, em i ken lusim. Sapos dispela kain pasin i kamap, orait dispela man o meri i bilip long Krais, em i no olsem kalabus i stap wantaim meri o man bilong en. Nogat. Em i ken larim em i go, long wanem, God i bin singautim yupela long i stap gut wantaim ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For how do you know, wife, whether you will save your husband? Or how do you know, husband, whether you will save your wife?

block.text: Yu meri, bai yu inap helpim man bilong yu na em i kamap Kristen, o nogat, em yu no save. Na yu man, bai yu inap helpim meri bilong yu na em i kamap Kristen, o nogat, em yu no save tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Only, as the Lord has distributed to each man, as God has called each, so let him walk. So I command in all the assemblies.

block.text: Yumi wan wan i mas i stap tasol long wanem kain laip God i bin makim pinis bilong yumi. Wanem kain laip yumi bin i stap long en long taim God i singautim yumi, yumi mas wokabaut long dispela kain laip tasol. Mi save putim dispela lo long olgeta sios.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Was anyone called having been circumcised? Let him not become uncircumcised. Has anyone been called in uncircumcision? Let him not be circumcised.

block.text: Sapos ol i bin katim pinis skin bilong sem bilong wanpela man, na God i singautim em, orait em i no ken stretim bek skin bilong en gen na haitim dispela samting ol i bin mekim long em. Na sapos wanpela man i no bin katim skin long taim God i singautim em, orait em i no ken katim skin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Circumcision is nothing, and uncircumcision is nothing, but the keeping of the commandments of God.

block.text: Pasin bilong katim skin, em i samting nating. Na pasin bilong man i no katim skin, em tu i samting nating. Tasol pasin bilong bihainim lo bilong God, em i samting tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let each man stay in that calling in which he was called.

block.text: Wanem kain laip yumi bin i stap long en long taim God i singautim yumi, orait yumi mas i stap yet long dispela kain laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Were you called being a bondservant? Don't let that bother you, but if you get an opportunity to become free, use it.

block.text: Ating yu bin i stap wokboi o wokmeri nating na God i singautim yu? Orait yu no ken bel hevi long dispela. Tasol sapos i gat rot bilong yu kamap fri, orait i gutpela sapos yu bihainim dispela rot.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who was called in the Lord being a bondservant is the Lord's free man. Likewise he who was called being free is Christ's bondservant.

block.text: Tasol man i bin i stap wokboi nating na God i singautim em, nau em i bilong Bikpela na long ai bilong Bikpela em i no moa i stap wokboi nating. Olsem tasol, man i bin i stap fri long taim Bikpela i singautim em, nau em i kamap wokboi nating bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You were bought with a price. Don't become bondservants of men.

block.text: God i bin baim bek yupela long bikpela pe tru, olsem na yupela i no ken i kamap wokboi nating bilong ol man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Brothers, let each man, in whatever condition he was called, stay in that condition with God.

block.text: Ol brata, wanem kain laip yumi bin i stap long en long taim God i singautim yumi, yumi mas i stap long dispela kain laip tasol wantaim God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now concerning virgins, I have no commandment from the Lord, but I give my judgment as one who has obtained mercy from the Lord to be trustworthy.

block.text: Mi no gat lo bilong Bikpela long givim long ol manmeri i no marit yet, tasol mi laik autim tingting bilong mi yet, long wanem, God i bin marimari long mi na mekim mi i kamap man bilong autim tok i tru tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I think that it is good therefore, because of the distress that is on us, that it is good for a man to be as he is.

block.text: Long dispela taim nau i gat ol bikpela hevi i wok long kamap, olsem na mobeta yupela olgeta i stap olsem yupela i stap nau.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Are you bound to a wife? Don't seek to be freed. Are you free from a wife? Don't seek a wife.

block.text: Sapos yu kisim meri pinis, orait yu no ken painim rot bilong lusim em. Na sapos yu no marit yet, orait yu no ken ting long kisim meri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if you marry, you have not sinned. If a virgin marries, she has not sinned. Yet such will have oppression in the flesh, and I want to spare you.

block.text: Tasol sapos yu kisim meri, yu no mekim sin. Na sapos yangpela meri i marit, em i no mekim sin. Tasol ol manmeri i marit bai i painim planti hevi long laip bilong ol, na mi no laik bai ol dispela hevi i kamap long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I say this, brothers: the time is short, that from now on, both those who have wives may be as though they had none;

block.text: Ol brata, mi tok olsem, taim i sotpela nau. Olsem na long dispela hap taim i stap yet, ol man i gat meri ol i mas i stap olsem ol i no gat meri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and those who weep, as though they didn't weep; and those who rejoice, as though they didn't rejoice; and those who buy, as though they didn't possess;

block.text: Na ol man i save krai, ol i mas i stap olsem ol i no krai. Na ol man i save amamas, ol i mas i stap olsem ol i no amamas. Na ol man i save baim samting, ol i mas i stap olsem ol i no gat samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and those who use the world, as not using it to the fullest. For the mode of this world passes away.

block.text: Na ol man i save mekim wok long samting bilong graun, ol i mas i stap olsem dispela wok i no bikpela samting long laip bilong ol. Yumi save, i no longtaim na bai dispela graun wantaim olgeta samting bilong en bai i pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I desire to have you to be free from cares. He who is unmarried is concerned for the things of the Lord, how he may please the Lord;

block.text: Mi no laik bai ol wari bilong dispela graun i pulim nabaut tingting bilong yupela. Man i no marit, em i save tingting planti long pasin bilong Bikpela. Em i laik mekim pasin Bikpela i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but he who is married is concerned about the things of the world, how he may please his wife.

block.text: Tasol man i marit, em i save tingting planti long ol samting bilong dispela graun. Em i laik mekim pasin meri bilong en i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There is also a difference between a wife and a virgin. The unmarried woman cares about the things of the Lord, that she may be holy both in body and in spirit. But she who is married cares about the things of the world--how she may please her husband.

block.text: Olsem na tingting bilong en i bruk. Na ol yangpela meri na ol arapela meri i no marit, ol i save tingting planti long pasin bilong Bikpela. Ol i laik givim ol yet olgeta long God na i stap holi long bodi na long spirit tu. Tasol meri i marit, em i save tingting planti long ol samting bilong dispela graun. Em i laik mekim pasin man bilong en i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This I say for your own profit; not that I may ensnare you. I hope that you choose what is best, and that you may attend to the Lord without distraction.

block.text: Mi mekim dispela tok bilong helpim yupela i stap gut. Em i no bilong pasim yupela. Nogat. Mi laik bai yupela i bihainim ol pasin i stret na mekim wok bilong Bikpela oltaim. Mi no laik bai wanpela samting i ken pulim nabaut tingting bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if any man thinks that he is behaving inappropriately toward his virgin, if she is past the flower of her age, let them marry. Let him do what he desires. He doesn't sin. Let them marry.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i ting em i mekim pasin i no stret long yangpela meri ol i bin makim bilong em, na sapos laik bilong en i strong tumas, na sapos em i lukim i no gat narapela rot, orait em i ken bihainim laik bilong en na maritim dispela meri. Em i no mekim sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who stands steadfast in his heart, having no necessity, but has power over his own heart, to keep his own virgin, does well.

block.text: Tasol sapos wanpela man i strong long bel bilong en, na i no gat wanpela samting i hariapim em, na em inap long bosim laik bilong em yet, na sapos em i pasim tingting pinis long em i no laik maritim dispela yangpela meri ol i bin makim bilong em, tasol tupela bai i stap singel tasol, orait dispela pasin i gutpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then both he who gives his own virgin in marriage does well, and he who doesn't give her in marriage does better.

block.text: Olsem na man i maritim yangpela meri ol i makim bilong en, em i mekim gutpela pasin. Tasol man i no maritim yangpela meri ol i makim bilong en, em i mekim pasin i gutpela moa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A wife is bound by law for as long as her husband lives. If the husband is dies, she is free to be married to whomever she desires, only in the Lord.

block.text: Sapos man bilong wanpela meri i no i dai yet, orait dispela meri i mas i stap yet olsem meri bilong dispela man. Tasol sapos man bilong en i dai, orait meri i no pas moa. Sapos em i laik maritim wanpela man, orait em i ken maritim em. Tasol em i mas maritim man i bilip long Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But she is happier if she stays as she is, in my judgment, and I think that I also have God's Spirit.

block.text: Tasol mi yet mi ting olsem, sapos em i no marit gen, em bai i stap amamas tasol. Mi ting Spirit bilong God i stap long mi, na mi autim ol dispela tok. god, o nogat?

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 8
Now concerning things sacrificed to idols: We know that we all have knowledge. Knowledge puffs up, but love builds up.

block.text: Nau mi laik toktok long pasin bilong kaikai abus ol i bin ofaim long ol giaman god. Sampela man i save tok, "Yumi olgeta i gat save." Dispela tok em i tru, tasol save nating em i save kirapim pasin bilong bikhet. Tasol pasin bilong givim bel bilong yumi long ol arapela man, dispela i save mekim yumi i kamap strongpela Kristen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if anyone thinks that he knows anything, he doesn't yet know as he ought to know.

block.text: Wanpela man inap ting olsem em i save tru long wanpela samting, tasol save bilong dispela man i no inap yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if anyone loves God, the same is known by him.

block.text: Tasol sapos wanpela man I givim bel bilong em long God, orait God i save tru long dispela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore concerning the eating of things sacrificed to idols, we know that no idol is anything in the world, and that there is no other God but one.

block.text: Long dispela pasin bilong kaikai abus ol i bin ofaim long giaman god, mi gat tok olsem. Yumi save, giaman god em i no samting tru. Em i piksa nating tasol. I no gat ol planti god i stap. Nogat. Wanpela God tasol i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For though there are things that are called “gods,” whether in the heavens or on earth; as there are many “gods” and many “lords”;

block.text: Tru, i gat planti samting ol i kolim "god," na planti samting ol i kolim "bikpela." Tasol maski sapos i tru dispela ol "god" i stap long heven o long graun,

ReferenceBlocks.text: yet to us there is one God, the Father, of whom are all things, and we for him. And there is one Lord, Jesus Christ, through whom are all things, and we live through him.

block.text: yumi gat wanpela God tasol, em God Papa. Em i as bilong olgeta samting, na yumi stap olsem ol manmeri bilong em stret. Na i gat wanpela Bikpela tasol, em Jisas Krais. Em i bin wokim olgeta samting, na yumi bin kisim laip long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However, that knowledge isn't in all men. But some, with consciousness of the idol until now, eat as of a thing sacrificed to an idol, and their conscience, being weak, is defiled.

block.text: Tasol sampela man i no save long ol dispela samting. Sampela i bin bihainim pasin bilong ol giaman god bipo. Olsem na taim ol i kaikai dispela mit, ol i save ting em i ofa tru bilong giaman god. Tingting bilong ol i no klia, na ol i kaikai, olsem na ol i pilim olsem ol i bin mekim pasin i no stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But food will not commend us to God. For neither, if we don't eat, are we the worse; nor, if we eat, are we the better.

block.text: Tru, kaikai i no inap bringim yumi i go klostu long God. Sapos yumi no kaikai, orait dispela i no mekim yumi i stap nogut long ai bilong God. Na sapos yumi kaikai, orait dispela tu i no mekim yumi i stap gut long ai bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But be careful that by no means does this liberty of yours become a stumbling block to the weak.

block.text: Tasol yupela i mas lukaut. Yupela i save olsem, yupela inap long kaikai wanem samting yupela i laikim. Tasol nogut dispela pasin bilong yupela i mekim, na ol man tingting bilong ol i no klia, ol i pundaun long sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For what if a man sees you who have knowledge sitting in an idol's temple? Won't his conscience, if he is weak, be emboldened to eat things sacrificed to idols?

block.text: Yu man i gat save, sapos yu go long haus lotu bilong giaman god na yu sindaun kaikai, na sapos wanpela man tingting bilong en i no klia, em i lukim yu, orait ating dispela pasin bilong yu bai i kirapim bel bilong em na em tu bai i kaikai samting ol i bin ofaim long ol giaman god.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And through your knowledge, he who is weak perishes, the brother for whose sake Christ died.

block.text: Na long dispela pasin, save bilong yu i bagarapim dispela man bilip bilong en i no strong, em dispela brata Krais i bin i dai bilong kisim bek em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Thus, sinning against the brothers, and wounding their conscience when it is weak, you sin against Christ.

block.text: Harim. Tingting bilong sampela brata i no klia. Na sapos yupela i mekim dispela sin long ol na bagarapim bilip bilong ol, long dispela pasin yupela i mekim sin long Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore if food causes my brother to stumble, I will eat no meat forevermore, that I don't cause my brother to stumble.

block.text: Olsem na sapos kaikai i save mekim brata bilong mi i pundaun long sin, orait mi no inap tru kaikai mit gen long laip bilong mi. Nogut mi mekim brata bilong mi i pundaun long sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 9
Am I not free? Am I not an apostle? Haven't I seen Jesus Christ, our Lord? Aren't you my work in the Lord?

block.text: Yupela lukim pasin bilong mi. Ating i gat wanpela samting i pasim mi? Nogat. Mi inap mekim wanem kain pasin mi laikim. Mi wanpela aposel, o nogat? Ating mi bin lukim Jisas, Bikpela bilong yumi, o nogat? Mi bin mekim wok bilong Bikpela, na ating yupela i bin kamap Kristen long wok bilong mi, o nogat?

ReferenceBlocks.text: If to others I am not an apostle, yet at least I am to you; for you are the seal of my apostleship in the Lord.

block.text: Sampela man i ting mi no aposel, tasol maski, yupela i save olsem, mi aposel. Yupela i stap Kristen pinis, na dispela i olsem mak bilong soim olsem, mi aposel tru bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: My defense to those who examine me is this.
Have we no right to eat and to drink?

block.text: Sampela man i save skelim pasin bilong mi, na mi save bekim dispela kain tok long ol.
Ating i no orait long mipela aposel i kisim kaikai na dring olsem pe bilong wok bilong mipela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Have we no right to take along a wife who is a believer, even as the rest of the apostles, and the brothers of the Lord, and Cephas?

block.text: Ating i no orait long mipela i maritim Kristen meri na kisim ol i go raun wantaim mipela, olsem ol arapela aposel na ol brata bilong Bikpela na Pita i save mekim?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or have only Barnabas and I no right to not work?

block.text: Ating mitupela Barnabas tasol i mas mekim wok mani bilong lukautim mitupela yet, na ol arapela nogat, a?

ReferenceBlocks.text: What soldier ever serves at his own expense? Who plants a vineyard, and doesn't eat of its fruit? Or who feeds a flock, and doesn't drink from the flock's milk?

block.text: Wanem man i save mekim wok soldia na em yet i painim kaikai bilong en? Wanem man i save planim gaden na i no kisim kaikai bilong en? Na wanem man i save lukautim lain sipsip na em yet i no dring susu bilong ol?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do I speak these things according to the ways of men? Or doesn't the law also say the same thing?

block.text: Nogut yupela i ting mi bihainim tingting bilong ol man tasol na mi mekim dispela tok. Nogat. Lo tu i gat wankain tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For it is written in the law of Moses,

block.text: Moses i raitim tok olsem long lo,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You shall not muzzle an ox while it treads out the grain.”

block.text: "Yupela i no ken pasim maus bilong bulmakau long taim em i wok long rausim skin bilong rais samting."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Is it for the oxen that God cares,
or does he say it assuredly for our sake? Yes, it was written for our sake, because he who plows ought to plow in hope, and he who threshes in hope should partake of his hope.

block.text: Ating God i tingting long ol bulmakau na em i mekim dispela tok? Nogat.

Em i tingting long yumi. Yes, dispela tok em i bilong yumi, long wanem, God i laik bai yumi mas mekim pasin olsem. Man i wok long brukim graun bilong gaden, na man i wok long rausim skin bilong rais samting, tupela i mekim dispela wok, long wanem, tupela i save tupela bai i kisim hap kaikai i kamap long wok bilong tupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we sowed to you spiritual things, is it a great thing if we reap your fleshly things?

block.text: Mipela i bin planim ol gutpela samting bilong spirit namel long yupela. Olsem na sapos yupela i givim mipela ol samting bilong helpim bodi, ating dispela i no stret, a? Em i olsem mipela i kisim kaikai long dispela samting mipela i bin planim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If others partake of this right over you, don't we yet more? Nevertheless we did not use this right, but we bear all things, that we may cause no hindrance to the Good News of Christ.

block.text: Sapos yupela i orait long ol arapela man i kisim ol samting long yupela, orait yupela i mas orait moa yet long mipela i kisim. i no save kisim. Olsem na mipela i save karim planti hevi. Mipela i no kisim, long wanem, mipela i no laik pasim rot bilong gutnius bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you know that those who serve around sacred things eat from the things of the temple? And those who wait on the altar have their portion with the altar?

block.text: Ol man i mekim wok long haus bilong God, ol i save kisim kaikai long haus bilong God. Na ol man i mekim wok bilong alta, ol i save kisim hap abus bilong ol ofa ol manmeri i mekim long alta. Ating yupela i no save long dispela?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so the Lord ordained that those who proclaim the Good News should live from the Good News.

block.text: Olsem tasol Bikpela i bin givim tok long yumi olsem, ol man i save wok long autim gutnius, ol i mas kisim ol samting bilong helpim bodi long ol manmeri i kisim gutnius.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have used none of these things, and I don't write these things that it may be done so in my case; for I would rather die, than that anyone should make my boasting void.

block.text: Tasol mi yet mi no save mekim dispela pasin Bikpela i tok long mi inap long mekim. Na nau tu mi no raitim dispela tok bilong kisim wanpela samting long yupela. Nogat tru. Mobeta mi dai pastaim. Mi save amamas long dispela pasin mi mekim. Olsem na mi no laik bai wanpela man i pinisim dispela pasin bilong mi, em mi save amamas long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if I preach the Good News, I have nothing to boast about; for necessity is laid on me; but woe is to me, if I don't preach the Good News.

block.text: Taim mi autim gutnius, mi no inap apim nem bilong mi yet na mi amamas na tok, mi mekim gutpela pasin tru. Nogat. Autim gutnius em wok Bikpela i givim mi na mi mas mekim. Mi no inap lusim dispela wok. Sapos mi no autim gutnius, bai mi stap nogut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if I do this of my own will, I have a reward. But if not of my own will, I have a stewardship entrusted to me.

block.text: Mi no inap kisim pe long dispela wok, long wanem, mi no mekim long laik bilong mi yet. Nogat. Bikpela i givim mi dispela wok na mi mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What then is my reward? That, when I preach the Good News, I may present the Good News of Christ without charge, so as not to abuse my authority in the Good News.

block.text: Olsem na bai mi kisim wanem pe? Ol samting mi inap long kisim long dispela wok bilong autim gutnius, em mi no save kisim. Mi save amamas tru long autim gutnius nating long ol manmeri. Na dispela amamas mi save kisim, em i olsem pe bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For though I was free from all, I brought myself under bondage to all, that I might gain the more.

block.text: Mi stap fri, na mi no wokboi nating bilong wanpela man. Tasol long laik bilong mi yet, mi bin kamap olsem wokboi nating bilong olgeta man, bilong mi ken kisim planti man moa i kam insait long lain bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To the Jews I became as a Jew, that I might gain Jews; to those who are under the law, as under the law, that I might gain those who are under the law.

block.text: Olsem na taim mi stap wantaim ol Juda mi save bihainim pasin bilong ol Juda, bilong mi ken kisim ol Juda. Mi yet mi no aninit long lo bilong Moses, tasol long ai bilong ol man i stap aninit long lo, mi save stap olsem man i stap aninit long lo, bilong mi ken kisim ol man i stap aninit long lo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For those who do not know the law of Moses, I live as if I did not know the law, to save those who do not know the law. Yet I have the law of God, because I obey the law of Christ.

block.text: Long ai bilong ol man i no gat lo bilong Moses, mi save stap olsem man i no aninit long dispela lo, bilong mi ken kisim ol man i no aninit long dispela lo. Tasol i no olsem mi lusim lo bilong God. Nogat. Mi bihainim lo bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To the weak I became as weak, that I might gain the weak. I have become all things to all men, that I may by all means save some.

block.text: Long ai bilong ol man i no gat strongpela bilip, mi save stap olsem man i no gat strongpela bilip, bilong mi ken kisim ol dispela man. Mi bin kisim pasin bilong olgeta kain man, long wanem, mi laik traim olgeta rot bilong kisim bek sampela bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I do this for the sake of the Good News, that I may be a joint partaker of it.

block.text: Mi save mekim dispela olgeta wok bilong mekim gutnius bilong Jisas i kamap strong, bai mi tu mi ken kisim ol gutpela samting Bikpela i redim pinis bilong givim long ol man i bilip long gutnius.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't you know that those who run in a race all run, but one receives the prize? Run like that, that you may win.

block.text: Ol man i ran long resis, olgeta i save ran, na wanpela tasol i save kisim prais. Ating yupela i no save long dispela? Orait yupela tu i mas ran strong bilong kisim prais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every man who strives in the games exercises self-control in all things. Now they do it to receive a corruptible crown, but we an incorruptible.

block.text: Na olgeta man i laik win long resis, ol i save daunim olgeta laik bilong bodi, na wok strong bilong kisim prais. Ol dispela prais ol i kisim, bihain bai ol i bagarap. Tasol prais yumi ting long kisim, em i no save bagarap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I therefore run like that, as not uncertainly. I fight like that, as not beating the air.

block.text: Olsem na mi mekim olsem man i ran strong, na i no save lukluk nabaut. Na mi mekim olsem man i boksen gut, na i no tromoi han nabaut na paitim win nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I keep my body and bring it into submission, lest by any means, after I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.

block.text: Nogat. Mi save paitim tru bodi bilong mi na mekim em i bihainim laik bilong mi. Nogut mi autim gutnius long ol arapela man na bihain mi yet mi no kisim prais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 10
Now I would not have you ignorant, brothers, that our fathers were all under the cloud, and all passed through the sea.

block.text: Ol brata, mi laik bai yupela i save gut olsem, long taim bilong Moses, olgeta tumbuna bilong yumi i bin i stap aninit long dispela klaut God i bin putim i stap bilong soim rot long ol. Na olgeta i bin wokabaut i kam brukim solwara Retsi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were all baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea.

block.text: Na i olsem olgeta i bin kisim baptais long klaut na long solwara, na dispela baptais i makim ol i stap lain bilong Moses.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all ate the same spiritual food.

block.text: Na olgeta i bin kaikai long dispela kaikai Spirit bilong God i givim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They all drank the same spiritual drink. For they drank of a spiritual rock that followed them, and the rock was Christ.

block.text: Na olgeta i bin dring long dispela wara Spirit bilong God i givim ol. Yes, ol i dringim wara bilong dispela ston bilong Spirit, em i bin wokabaut wantaim ol. Dispela ston em Krais yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However with most of them, God was not well pleased, for they were overthrown in the wilderness.

block.text: Tasol God i no laikim pasin bilong planti bilong ol dispela lain manmeri. Olsem na ol i bin i dai long ples drai nating, na bodi bilong ol i bin slip nabaut long dispela hap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now these things were our examples, to the intent we should not lust after evil things, as they also lusted.

block.text: Na dispela olgeta samting i bin kamap olsem piksa, bilong yumi ken lukim na yumi no ken mangal long ol samting nogut, olsem ol i bin mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Neither be idolaters, as some of them were. As it is written,

block.text: Yupela i no ken lotu long ol giaman god, olsem sampela bilong ol i bin mekim. Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The people sat down to eat and drink, and rose up to play.”

block.text: "Ol i sindaun long kaikai na dring, na bihain ol man i go pilai long ol meri."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Neither let us commit sexual immorality, as some of them committed, and in one day twenty-three thousand fell.

block.text: Yumi no ken mekim pasin pamuk, olsem sampela bilong ol i bin mekim, na long wanpela de tasol 23,000 bilong ol i bin lus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Neither let us test the Lord, as some of them tested, and perished by the serpents.

block.text: Na yumi no ken traim Krais tu, olsem sampela bilong ol i bin mekim, na ol snek nogut i kaikaim ol na ol i bagarap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Neither grumble, as some of them also grumbled, and perished by the destroyer.

block.text: Na yupela i no ken tok kros long God, olsem sampela bilong ol i bin mekim, na ensel bilong kilim man i dai, em i bin kam na kilim ol i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now all these things happened to them by way of example, and they were written for our admonition, on whom the ends of the ages have come.

block.text: Dispela ol samting i bin kamap long ol, em i olsem piksa bilong ol arapela man i ken lukim. Ol man i bin raitim ol dispela stori long buk bilong God, bilong givim tingting long yumi ol man i stap long dispela taim nau, em taim dispela graun klostu i laik pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore let him who thinks he stands be careful that he doesn't fall.

block.text: Olsem na sapos wanpela man i ting em i sanap strong, orait em i mas lukaut gut. Nogut em i pundaun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No temptation has taken you except what is common to man. God is faithful, who will not allow you to be tempted above what you are able, but will with the temptation also make the way of escape, that you may be able to endure it.

block.text: Ol traim i bin kamap long yupela, ol i no ol narakain traim. Nogat. Ol i wankain olsem ol traim i save kamap long olgeta man. Na God i save bihainim tok bilong en, na em bai i no inap larim wanpela bilong ol traim i kamap long yupela, em i winim strong bilong yupela. Nogat. Sapos traim i kamap long yupela, orait God bai i wokim rot bilong helpim yupela. Dispela rot i olsem. Em bai i mekim yupela i sanap strong, na dispela traim bai i no inap daunim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, my beloved, flee from idolatry.

block.text: Olsem na, ol pren tru bilong mi, yupela i mas i stap longwe long pasin bilong lotu long ol giaman god.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I speak as to wise men. Judge what I say.

block.text: Yupela i gat save, olsem na mi tokim yupela. Yupela yet i mas skelim tok bilong mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The cup of blessing which we bless, isn't it a sharing of the blood of Christ? The bread which we break, isn't it a sharing of the body of Christ?

block.text: Dispela kap i gat blesing bilong God, na yumi save tok tenkyu long God long en, taim yumi dring long en, em i save bungim yumi wantaim blut bilong Krais. Na dispela bret yumi save brukim, taim yumi kaikai long en, em i save bungim yumi wantaim bodi bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Because there is one loaf of bread, we, who are many, are one body; for we all partake of the one loaf of bread.

block.text: I gat wanpela bret tasol, na yumi olgeta i save kaikai long dispela wanpela bret, olsem na yumi planti manmeri yumi stap wanpela bodi tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Consider Israel according to the flesh. Don't those who eat the sacrifices participate in the altar?

block.text: Yupela tingim pasin bilong ol Israel. Taim ol i kaikai abus ol i bin kukim antap long alta, dispela i save bungim ol wantaim God bilong dispela alta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What am I saying then? That a thing sacrificed to idols is anything, or that an idol is anything?

block.text: Tasol nogut yupela i ting mi tok olsem, ol ofa ol haiden i save mekim long ol giaman god, ol i samting tru. Na mi no tok olsem ol giaman god, ol i samting tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I say that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice, they sacrifice to demons, and not to God. I don't desire that you would have fellowship with demons.

block.text: Nogat. Mi tok olsem. Samting ol haiden i save ofaim, em "ol i ofaim long ol spirit nogut. Ol i no ofaim long God." Na mi no laik bai yupela i bung wantaim ol spirit nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You can't both drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons. You can't both partake of the table of the Lord, and of the table of demons.

block.text: I no inap yupela i dring long kap bilong Bikpela na long kap bilong ol spirit nogut tu. Na i no inap yupela i kaikai long tebol bilong Bikpela na long tebol bilong ol spirit nogut tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or do we provoke the Lord to jealousy? Are we stronger than he?

block.text: Ating yumi laik mekim Bikpela i bel nogut na kros long yumi, a? Strong bilong yumi i winim strong bilong em, a?
