ReferenceBlocks.text: “All things are lawful for me,” but not all things are profitable. “All things are lawful for me,” but not all things build up.

block.text: "Olgeta samting i orait long yumi mekim," tasol i no olgeta samting i save helpim yumi long i stap gut. "Olgeta samting i orait long yumi mekim," tasol i no olgeta samting i save mekim yumi i kamap strongpela Kristen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let no one seek his own, but each one his neighbor's good.

block.text: Yumi no ken ting long helpim yumi yet. Nogat. Yumi mas ting long helpim ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whatever is sold in the butcher shop, eat, asking no question for the sake of conscience.

block.text: Olgeta mit samting ol i save salim long maket, em yupela i ken kaikai. Yupela i no ken tingting planti na askim nabaut. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The scriptures say, for “the earth is the Lord's, and its fullness.”

block.text: Yumi save, "Dispela graun, wantaim olgeta samting i stap long en, em olgeta i bilong Bikpela tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: But what if one of those who don't believe invites you to a meal, and you are inclined to go? Eat whatever is set before you, asking no questions for the sake of conscience.

block.text: Na tu, sapos wanpela man i no bilip long Jisas, em i askim yupela long i go kaikai wantaim em, na sapos yupela i laik i go, em i orait. Yupela i ken kaikai olgeta samting em i givim long yupela. Na yupela i no ken tingting planti na askim nabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if anyone says to you, “This was offered to idols, don't eat it for the sake of the one who told you. And for the sake of conscience. For ‘the earth is the Lord's, and all its fullness.’”

block.text: Tasol sapos wanpela man i stap na i tokim yupela olsem, "Dispela mit ol i bin ofaim long giaman god," orait yupela i mas ting long dispela man i bin tokim yupela, na yupela i no ken kaikai. Nogut yupela i mekim rong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Conscience, I say, not your own, but the other's conscience. For why is my liberty judged by another conscience?

block.text: Mi no tok long yupela yet bai i mekim rong. Mi tok long dispela arapela man bai i pilim olsem yupela i mekim rong. kaikai wanem samting mi laikim. Bilong wanem mi mas bihainim tingting bilong narapela man long wanem samting i tambu long mi long mekim?

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I partake with thankfulness, why am I denounced for that for which I give thanks?

block.text: Sapos mi tenkyu long God na mi kaikai, orait olsem wanem na narapela man inap mekim ol tok nogut long mi long dispela samting mi tenkyu long God na mi mekim?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whether therefore you eat, or drink, or whatever you do, do all to the glory of God.

block.text: Olsem na sapos yupela i kaikai na dring o yupela i mekim narapela samting, yupela i mas mekim dispela olgeta samting bilong givim biknem long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Give no occasions for stumbling, either to Jews, or to Greeks, or to the assembly of God.

block.text: Yupela i mas ting long ol Juda na ol Grik na ol manmeri bilong sios bilong God, na yupela i no ken mekim olkain pasin inap long mekim ol i pundaun long sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I want to please all men in all things, not seeking my own profit, but the profit of the many, that they may be saved.

block.text: Mi tu, mi save mekim olgeta samting inap long olgeta man i ken laikim olgeta pasin mi mekim. Mi no save wok long helpim mi yet. Mi wok long helpim ol arapela manmeri, bai God i ken kisim bek ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 11
Be imitators of me, even as I also am of Christ.

block.text: Yupela i mas bihainim pasin bilong mi na wokabaut, olsem mi tu mi save bihainim pasin bilong Krais na wokabaut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I praise you, brothers, that you remember me in all things, and hold firm the traditions, even as I delivered them to you.

block.text: Oltaim yupela i save tingting long mi na holimpas olgeta dispela tok mi bin kisim na givim long yupela. Olsem na mi tok, yupela i save mekim gutpela pasin tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I would have you know that the head of every man is Christ, and the head of the woman is the man, and the head of Christ is God.

block.text: Tasol mi laik bai yupela i save tu long narapela tok olsem. Het bilong olgeta man em Krais, na het bilong meri em man bilong en, na het bilong Krais em God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every man praying or prophesying, having his head covered, dishonors his head.

block.text: Sapos man i karamapim het bilong en na i mekim prea o i autim tok profet, dispela man em i semim het bilong en, em Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But every woman praying or prophesying with her head unveiled dishonors her head. For it is one and the same thing as if she were shaved.

block.text: Na sapos wanpela meri i no karamapim het bilong en na i mekim prea o i autim tok profet, em tu i semim het bilong en. Em i wankain olsem meri i katim olgeta gras bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if a woman is not covered, let her also be shorn. But if it is shameful for a woman to be shorn or shaved, let her be covered.

block.text: Sapos meri i no karamapim het bilong en, orait em i mas katim gras bilong en sotpela. Na sapos meri i sem long katim sotpela o long rausim olgeta, orait em i mas karamapim het.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For a man indeed ought not to have his head covered, because he is the image and glory of God, but the woman is the glory of the man.

block.text: Man i no ken karamapim het bilong en, long wanem, em i stap olsem piksa i soim biknem na strong bilong God. Na meri em i soim biknem na strong bilong man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For man is not from woman, but woman from man;
for neither was man created for the woman, but woman for the man.

block.text: God i no bin wokim man long bodi bilong meri. Nogat. Em i wokim meri long bodi bilong man.
Na God i no bin ting long meri na i wokim man bilong helpim em. Nogat. Em i ting long man na i wokim meri bilong helpim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause the woman ought to have authority on her head, because of the angels.

block.text: Olsem na meri i mas karamapim het bilong en olsem mak bilong em i mekim wok bilong God, bai ol ensel i ken lukim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless, neither is the woman independent of the man, nor the man independent of the woman, in the Lord.

block.text: Tasol long lain bilong Bikpela, ol meri i no i stap ol yet, na ol man tu i no i stap ol yet. Nogat. Meri i stap helpim bilong man, na man i stap helpim bilong meri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as woman came from man, so a man also comes through a woman; but all things are from God.

block.text: Pastaim God i bin wokim meri long bodi bilong man, tasol nau man i save kamap long bodi bilong meri. Na God yet em i as bilong olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Judge for yourselves. Is it appropriate that a woman pray to God unveiled?

block.text: Yupela yet i mas skelim dispela tok. Sapos meri i no karamapim het na i mekim prea long God, ating em i gutpela pasin?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Doesn't even nature itself teach you that if a man has long hair, it is a dishonor to him?

block.text: Pasin bilong yumi manmeri yet i soim yupela olsem, sapos man i gat longpela gras, em i no stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if a woman has long hair, it is a glory to her, for her hair is given to her for a covering.

block.text: Na sapos meri i gat longpela gras, dispela em i olsem gutpela bilas bilong en. Long wanem, God i bin givim longpela gras long em bilong karamapim het bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if any man seems to be contentious, we have no such custom, neither do God's assemblies.

block.text: Tasol sapos wanpela man i laik pait long toktok long ol dispela tok bilong mi, em i mas save gut olsem, mipela i no save bihainim ol arapela kain pasin, na ol sios bilong God tu i no gat ol arapela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But in giving you this command, I don't praise you, that you come together not for the better but for the worse.

block.text: Orait nau mi laik tokim yupela long sampela pasin yupela i mas bihainim. Na long dispela samting mi laik toktok long en, mi no ken tok amamas long ol pasin yupela i save mekim. Nogat. Long taim yupela i bung bilong lotu, gutpela pasin i no save kamap. Nogat. Pasin bilong yupela i no gutpela tumas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For first of all, when you come together in the assembly, I hear that divisions exist among you, and I partly believe it.

block.text: Pastaim mi laik tok long dispela. Mi harim tok olsem, taim yupela i bung bilong lotu, yupela i save bruk nabaut na tok pait namel long yupela yet. Na mi bilip liklik long dispela tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For there also must be factions among you, that those who are approved may be revealed among you.

block.text: long wanem, mi ting sios bilong yupela i mas bruk liklik, bai yupela i ken save gut, wanem ol manmeri bilong yupela i save bihainim tru ol pasin God i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When therefore you assemble yourselves together, it is not the Lord's supper that you eat.

block.text: Olsem na taim yupela i bung bilong lotu, dispela kaikai yupela i save mekim, em i no kaikai tru bilong Bikpela. Nogat.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in your eating each one takes his own supper first. One is hungry, and another is drunken.

block.text: Yupela wan wan i save hariap na kisim kaikai bilong yupela yet na kaikai. Na sampela i save stap hangre, na sampela i save dring planti wain na ol i spak.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What, don't you have houses to eat and to drink in? Or do you despise God's assembly, and put them to shame who don't have? What shall I tell you? Shall I praise you? In this I don't praise you.

block.text: Olsem wanem? Ating yupela i no gat ol haus bilong kaikai na dring long en, a? Yupela i ting sios bilong God em i samting nating, na yupela i kam bilong mekim ol brata i no gat kaikai i pilim sem? Bai mi tok wanem long yupela? Ating bai mi tok amamas long pasin bilong yupela? Long dispela samting mi no ken tok amamas long yupela. Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I received from the Lord that which also I delivered to you, that the Lord Jesus on the night in which he was betrayed took bread.

block.text: Dispela tok mi bin givim long yupela, em mi kisim long Bikpela tasol. Dispela tok i olsem. Long nait Judas i bin putim Jisas long han bilong ol birua, long dispela nait Bikpela Jisas i kisim bret,

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he had given thanks, he broke it, and said,

block.text: na i tenkyu long God, na i brukim, na i tok,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take, eat. This is my body, which is broken for you. Do this in memory of me.”

block.text: "Dispela em i bodi bilong mi, mi givim bilong helpim yupela. Yupela i mas mekim olsem bilong tingim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the same way he also took the cup, after supper, saying,

block.text: Na taim ol i kaikai pinis, em i kisim kap wain na i mekim wankain pasin long en. Em i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “This cup is the new covenant in my blood. Do this, as often as you drink, in memory of me.”

block.text: "Dispela kap wain em i nupela kontrak mi mekim long blut bilong mi yet. Olgeta taim yupela i dring long dispela kap, yupela i mas mekim olsem bilong tingim mi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup, you proclaim the Lord's death until he comes.

block.text: Dispela tok bilong Jisas i soim olsem, olgeta taim yupela i kaikai dispela bret na dring long dispela kap, yupela i save tokaut long pen na i dai bilong Bikpela, inap long taim em i kam bek.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore whoever eats this bread or drinks the Lord's cup in a way unworthy of the Lord will be guilty of the body and the blood of the Lord.

block.text: Olsem na sapos wanpela man i mekim pasin i no stret long taim em i kaikai dispela bret bilong Bikpela na i dring long dispela kap bilong Bikpela, orait i olsem em i mekim nogut long bodi na blut bilong Bikpela yet, na em i gat asua long dispela pasin bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But let a man examine himself, and so let him eat of the bread, and drink of the cup.

block.text: Man i mas skelim gut bel bilong em yet pastaim, na em i ken kaikai dispela bret na dring long dispela kap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who eats and drinks in an unworthy way eats and drinks damnation to himself, if he doesn't discern the Lord's body.

block.text: Long wanem, man i no tingting gut long bodi bilong Bikpela, na em i kaikai na dring, em i bringim asua i kam long em yet, na God bai i mekim save long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause many among you are weak and sickly, and not a few sleep.

block.text: Long dispela as tasol, planti manmeri namel long yupela i no gat strong na ol i gat sik na sampela i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if we discerned ourselves, we wouldn't be judged.

block.text: Tasol sapos yumi skelim gut bel bilong yumi yet na yumi kaikai na dring, orait bai yumi no gat asua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when we are judged, we are punished by the Lord, that we may not be condemned with the world.

block.text: Tasol taim Bikpela i lukim ol pasin bilong yumi i no stret na em i givim ol hevi long yumi, em i mekim olsem bilong stretim yumi, bai yumi no ken lus wantaim ol manmeri bilong graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, my brothers, when you come together to eat, wait for one another.

block.text: Olsem na, ol brata bilong mi, sapos yupela i bung bilong kaikai, yupela i mas wetim ol arapela pastaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if anyone is hungry, let him eat at home, lest your coming together be for judgment. The rest I will set in order whenever I come.

block.text: Sapos wanpela i hangre, em i mas kaikai long haus bilong en. Nogut bung bilong yupela em i kamapim kot bilong yupela. Hap tok i stap yet,em bai mi stretim long taim mi kam lukim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 12
Now concerning spiritual things, brothers, I don't want you to be ignorant.

block.text: Ol brata, nau mi laik tokim yupela gut long ol presen bilong Holi Spirit.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You know that when you were heathen, you were led away to those mute idols, however you might be led.

block.text: Yupela i save pinis, taim yupela i stap haiden yet, sapos wanpela samting i pulim yupela i go long ol dispela giaman god i no save toktok, orait yupela i save go tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore I make known to you that no man speaking by God's Spirit says, “Jesus is accursed.” No one can say, “Jesus is Lord,” but by the Holy Spirit.

block.text: Olsem na mi laik bai yupela i tingting gut long wanpela tok olsem. Sapos Spirit bilong God i stap long wanpela man na i givim toktok long em, dispela man i no inap tok, "Jisas i ken bagarap." Na man i no gat Holi Spirit, em i no inap tok, "Jisas em i Bikpela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now there are various kinds of gifts, but the same Spirit.

block.text: I gat ol kain kain presen bilong Holi Spirit, tasol i gat wanpela Spirit tasol i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There are various kinds of service, and the same Lord.

block.text: Na yumi ken mekim ol kain kain wok long Bikpela, tasol i gat wanpela Bikpela tasol i stap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There are various kinds of workings, but the same God, who works all things in all.

block.text: I gat kain kain pasin bilong mekim wok, tasol i gat wanpela God tasol i givim strong long olgeta manmeri, na ol inap long mekim olgeta dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But to each one is given the manifestation of the Spirit for the profit of all.

block.text: Holi Spirit i save kamapim strong bilong en long olgeta manmeri wan wan, bai ol i ken helpim ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For to one is given through the Spirit the word of wisdom, and to another the word of knowledge, according to the same Spirit.

block.text: Long wanpela man Holi Spirit i givim strong bilong autim gutpela tingting long ol arapela. Na long narapela man dispela wanpela Spirit tasol i givim strong bilong autim sampela kain save bilong God long ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To another, the gift of faithis given by the same Spirit; and to another gifts of healings by the same Spirit.

block.text: Na narapela man i kisim strongpela bilip long dispela wanpela Spirit tasol. Na long dispela wanpela Spirit tasol narapela i kisim strong bilong mekim orait ol sikman.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To another, workings of miracles are given; and to another prophecy; and to another discerning of spirits; to another different kinds of languages; and to another the interpretation of languages.

block.text: Na narapela i kisim strong bilong wokim mirakel. Na narapela i kisim strong bilong autim tok profet. Na narapela i kisim save bilong skelim ol kain kain spirit. Na narapela i kisim save bilong mekim tok long kain kain tok ples. Na narapela i kisim save bilong tanim ol dispela tok ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the one and the same Spirit works all of these, distributing to each one separately as he desires.

block.text: Dispela wanpela Spirit tasol i save kamapim dispela olgeta samting. Long laik bilong em yet em i save tilim wanpela presen long wanpela man na narapela presen long narapela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as the body is one, and has many members, and all the members of the body, being many, are one body; so also is Christ.

block.text: Bodi bilong man em i wanpela tasol, na i gat planti hap bilong en. Na dispela planti hap bilong bodi em olgeta i stap wanpela bodi tasol. Na Krais tu i stap olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: For in one Spirit we were all baptized into one body, whether Jews or Greeks, whether bond or free; and were all given to drink into one Spirit.

block.text: long wanem, wanpela Holi Spirit tasol i bin baptaisim yumi olgeta na mekim yumi i kamap wanpela bodi tasol, yumi ol Juda na Grik, na yumi ol wokboi nating na yumi man i stap fri. Yumi olgeta i bin kisim wanpela Spirit tasol bilong yumi ken dring long en na kisim strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the body is not one member, but many.

block.text: Yumi save, bodi em i no wanpela hap tasol. Nogat. Em i gat planti hap bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If the foot would say, “Because I'm not the hand, I'm not part of the body,” it is not therefore not part of the body.

block.text: Sapos lek i tok olsem, "Mi no han, olsem na mi no hap bilong bodi," maski, em i stap yet olsem hap bilong bodi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If the ear would say, “Because I'm not the eye, I'm not part of the body,” it's not therefore not part of the body.

block.text: Na sapos yau i tok, "Mi no ai, olsem na mi no hap bilong bodi," maski, em i stap yet olsem hap bilong bodi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If the whole body were an eye, where would the hearing be? If the whole were hearing, where would the smelling be?

block.text: Sapos bodi olgeta em i ai tasol, olsem wanem bai em i harim tok? Sapos bodi olgeta em i yau tasol, olsem wanem bai em i smelim samting?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now God has set the members, each one of them, in the body, just as he desired.

block.text: Tasol bodi em i no olsem. Nogat. God i bin putim olgeta hap wan wan i stap long bodi, olsem em yet i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If they were all one member, where would the body be?
But now they are many members, but one body.

block.text: Sapos wanpela hap bilong bodi tasol i stap, orait dispela em i no bodi tru.
Tasol bodi i no olsem. Nogat. I gat planti hap bilong bodi, na ol i stap wanpela bodi tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The eye can't tell the hand, “I have no need for you,” or again the head to the feet, “I have no need for you.”

block.text: Na ai i no inap tokim han olsem, "Sapos yu no i stap, mi wanpela bai mi stap gut." Na het tu i no inap tokim lek, "Sapos yu no i stap, mi wanpela bai mi stap gut."

ReferenceBlocks.text: No, much rather, those members of the body which seem to be weaker are necessary.

block.text: Nogat. Ol hap bodi yumi save ting ol i no strong, sapos ol i no i stap, bai bodi i no inap i stap gut. Nogat tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those parts of the body which we think to be less honorable, on those we bestow more abundant honor; and our unpresentable parts have more abundant propriety.

block.text: Na ol hap bodi yumi save ting ol i nogut liklik, yumi save bilasim ol moa. Na ol hap bodi yumi save sem long en, yumi save karamapim gut tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Our presentable parts have no such need. But God composed the body together, giving more abundant honor to the inferior part.

block.text: Tasol ol arapela hap bodi, yumi save larim i stap nating. God i bin putim olgeta hap bilong bodi i stap wantaim. Na sampela hap ol i olsem ol i no gat nem, ol i save stap nambawan tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That way there is no division in the body, All the members take care of one another.

block.text: Em i mekim olsem bai bodi i no ken bruk hap hap. Nogat. Olgeta hap wan wan ol i ken lukautim ol arapela hap long wankain pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When one member suffers, all the members suffer with it. Or when one member is honored, all the members rejoice with it.

block.text: Olsem na sapos wanpela hap bodi i pilim pen, olgeta hap i save pilim pen wantaim. Na sapos wanpela hap i kisim biknem, olgeta hap i save amamas wantaim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now you are the body of Christ, and members individually.

block.text: Orait yupela olgeta i stap bodi bilong Krais. Na yupela wan wan i stap hap bilong bodi bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God has set some in the assembly: first apostles, second prophets, and third teachers. Then miracle workers, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, and various kinds of languages.

block.text: Na God i bin makim ol manmeri bilong mekim wok bilong sios. Namba wan, em ol aposel, na namba 2, em ol lain bilong autim tok profet, na namba 3, em ol lain bilong skulim ol manmeri long pasin God i laikim. Na tu, i gat ol lain bilong wokim mirakel. Na i gat ol lain bilong mekim orait ol sikman, na ol lain bilong helpim ol arapela, na ol lain bilong bosim kain kain wok, na ol lain bilong mekim tok long kain kain tok ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Are all apostles? Are all prophets? Are all teachers? Are all miracle workers?

block.text: Olsem wanem? Ating olgeta i stap aposel? Ating olgeta i gat wok bilong autim tok profet? Ating olgeta i gat wok bilong skulim ol manmeri? Ating olgeta i gat strong bilong wokim mirakel?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do all have gifts of healings? Do all speak with various languages? Do all interpret?

block.text: Ating olgeta i gat strong bilong mekim orait ol sikman? Ating olgeta i save mekim tok long kain kain tok ples? Ating olgeta inap long tanim dispela tok? Nogat. Olgeta i gat wok bilong ol yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But earnestly desire the best gifts. Moreover, I show a most excellent way to you.

block.text: Tasol yupela i mas strong long laikim na kisim ol nambawan presen bilong Holi Spirit. Nau mi laik tokim yupela long wanpela pasin i nambawan tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 13
If I speak with the languages of men and of angels, but don't have love, I have become sounding brass, or a clanging cymbal.

block.text: Sapos mi save toktok long ol manmeri long kain kain tok ples bilong man na long tok bilong ol ensel tu, tasol mi no givim bel bilong mi long ol, orait mi olsem belo i mekim planti nois, na mi olsem garamut i pairap nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I have the gift of prophecy, and know all mysteries and all knowledge; and if I have all faith, so as to remove mountains, but don't have love, I am nothing.

block.text: Na sapos mi save autim tok profet na mi save pinis long olgeta tingting hait bilong God na mi gat olgeta arapela save tu, na sapos mi gat strongpela bilip tru inap long mekim ol maunten i surik i go long narapela hap, tasol sapos mi no givim bel bilong mi long ol manmeri, orait mi olsem samting nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I dole out all my goods to feed the poor, and if I give my body to be burned, but don't have love, it profits me nothing.

block.text: Na sapos mi givim olgeta samting bilong mi long ol rabisman, na sapos mi larim ol man i holimpas mi na kukim bodi bilong mi long paia na mi dai pinis, tasol sapos mi no bin givim bel bilong mi long ol, orait dispela olgeta pasin bilong mi bai i no inap helpim mi liklik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Love is patient and is kind; love doesn't envy. Love doesn't brag, is not proud.

block.text: Man i save givim bel bilong en long ol arapela, em i no save kros kwik na bekim pasin nogut ol i mekim long em. Nogat. Em i save mekim gutpela pasin long olgeta man. Em i no save bel nogut long ol man i gat planti samting. Em i no save litimapim nem bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Love doesn't behave itself inappropriately, doesn't seek its own way, is not provoked, takes no account of evil.

block.text: Em i no save hambak na em i no save bikhet nabaut. Em i no save tingting tumas long em yet. Em i no save belhat kwik. Em i no save tingim rong ol i mekim long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It doesn't rejoice in unrighteousness, but rejoices with the truth.

block.text: Em i no save amamas long pasin i no stret. Nogat. Em i save amamas long stretpela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Love bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.

block.text: Man i save givim bel bilong en long ol arapela, em i no save larim wanpela samting i daunim em. Nogat. Oltaim em i save bilip long God na wetim God i helpim em. Na long taim bilong hevi em i save sanap strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

block.text: Dispela pasin bilong givim bel bilong yumi long ol arapela, em i no inap pinis. Nogat tru. Wok bilong autim tok bilong God olsem profet, em bai i pinis. Na ol kain kain tok ples bai i pinis. Na olgeta kain save bilong ol man, em tu bai i pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we know in part, and we prophesy in part;

block.text: Nau yumi gat hap hap save tasol long ol samting. Na tu, yumi save autim ol hap hap tok profet tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: but when that which is complete has come, then that which is partial will be done away with.

block.text: Tasol bihain samting tru bai i kamap, na long dispela taim olgeta dispela hap hap samting nau yumi save long en, ol bai i pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I was a child, I spoke as a child, I felt as a child, I thought as a child. Now that I have become a man, I have put away childish things.

block.text: Dispela i wankain olsem pikinini i kamap bikpela. Taim mi stap pikinini yet, save bilong mi i olsem save bilong ol pikinini, na mi save tingting na toktok long pasin bilong pikinini. Tasol taim mi kamap bikpela pinis, mi lusim ol pasin bilong pikinini.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For now we see in a mirror, dimly, but then face to face. Now I know in part, but then I will know fully, even as I was also fully known.

block.text: Nau yumi save hap hap tasol long ol samting bilong God. I olsem yumi lukim ol long glas tasol. Tasol long dispela taim bihain, bai yumi lukim tru pes bilong God. Na bai yumi save tru long em, olsem nau em i save tru long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now faith, hope, and love remain--these three. The greatest of these is love.

block.text: Pasin bilong bilip, na pasin bilong wetim God i mekim gut long yumi, na pasin bilong givim bel bilong yumi long ol arapela, dispela tripela pasin bai i stap oltaim. Tasol namba wan pasin tru, em pasin bilong givim bel bilong yumi long ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 14
Follow after love, and earnestly desire spiritual gifts, but especially that you may prophesy.

block.text: Yupela i mas strong long givim bel bilong yupela long ol manmeri oltaim. Na yupela i mas laikim tumas long kisim olgeta presen bilong Holi Spirit. Tasol namba wan presen yupela i mas laikim tru long kisim, em strong bilong autim tok bilong God olsem profet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he who speaks in another language speaks not to men, but to God; for no one understands; but in the Spirit he speaks mysteries.

block.text: Yumi save, man i mekim tok long narapela tok ples, em i no givim tok long ol man. Nogat. Em i toktok long God tasol, long wanem, i no gat man i save long wanem tok em i mekim. Long strong bilong Holi Spirit em i mekim ol tok hait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But he who prophesies speaks to men for their edification, exhortation, and consolation.

block.text: Tasol man i autim tok profet, tok bilong dispela man em i save strongim bilip bilong ol man na kirapim ol long mekim gutpela pasin na mekim orait bel bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who speaks in another language edifies himself, but he who prophesies edifies the assembly.

block.text: Man i mekim tok long narapela tok ples, em i strongim bel bilong em yet. Tasol man i autim tok profet, em i strongim bilip bilong olgeta manmeri bilong sios.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I desire to have you all speak with other languages, but rather that you would prophesy. For he is greater who prophesies than he who speaks with other languages, unless he interprets, that the assembly may be built up.

block.text: Mi laik bai yupela olgeta i ken mekim tok long narapela tok ples. Tasol mi laikim tumas bai yupela i autim tok profet. Sapos man i mekim tok long narapela tok ples, orait i mas i gat man bilong tanim tok bai ol manmeri bilong sios i ken kisim strong. Sapos i no gat man bilong tanim tok, orait man i autim tok bilong God i winim man i mekim tok long narapela tok ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now, brothers, if I come to you speaking with other languages, what would I profit you? Unless I speak to you either by way of revelation, or of knowledge, or of prophesying, or of teaching?

block.text: Ol brata, yupela tingting gut long dispela tok. Sapos mi kam long yupela na mi mekim tok long ol kain kain tok ples, olsem wanem bai mi helpim yupela? Sapos mi laik helpim yupela, orait mi mas tokim yupela long sampela tok God i bin soim mi o mi mas givim gutpela save long yupela o mi mas autim tok bilong God olsem profet o mi mas skulim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even things without life, giving a voice, whether pipe or harp. If they didn't give a distinction in the sounds, how would it be known what is piped or harped?

block.text: Ol samting i no gat laip, olsem mambu na gita, ol tu i no inap mekim gut wok bilong ol sapos krai bilong ol i no kamap gut. Sapos krai bilong ol i no kamap gut, orait olsem wanem bai yumi save ol man i mekim wanem song?

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if the trumpet gave an uncertain sound, who would prepare himself for war?

block.text: Na sapos biugel i no krai stret, husat bai i redi long pait?

ReferenceBlocks.text: So also you, unless you uttered by the tongue words easy to understand, how would it be known what is spoken? For you would be speaking into the air.

block.text: Yupela tu i olsem tasol. Sapos yupela i mekim tok long narapela tok ples ol man i no save long en, olsem wanem bai ol i save as bilong dispela tok? Tok bilong yupela bai i lus nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There are, it may be, so many kinds of sounds in the world, and none of them is without meaning.

block.text: Tru, i gat planti kain tok ples i stap long graun, na olgeta i gutpela bilong autim tingting bilong ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If then I don't know the meaning of the sound, I would be to him who speaks a foreigner, and he who speaks would be a foreigner to me.

block.text: Tasol sapos mi no save long tok wanpela man i mekim, bai em i ting olsem mi man bilong narapela lain. Na bai mi tu mi ting olsem dispela man em i man bilong narapela lain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So also you, since you are zealous for spiritual gifts, seek that you may abound to the building up of the assembly.

block.text: Kain pasin olsem bai i kamap namel long yupela long taim yupela i mekim tok long narapela tok ples. Mi save, yupela i laikim tumas long kisim ol presen bilong Holi Spirit. Orait yupela i mas wok strong long kisim ol dispela kain presen i save strongim sios.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore let him who speaks in another language pray that he may interpret.

block.text: Orait man i mekim tok long narapela tok ples, em i mas prea long God i givim em strong bilong tanim dispela tok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if I pray in another language, my spirit prays, but my understanding is unfruitful.

block.text: Yupela tingim. Sapos mi mekim prea long narapela tok ples, orait spirit bilong mi em i prea, tasol tingting bilong mi em i stap nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What is it then? I will pray with the spirit, and I will pray with the understanding also. I will sing with the spirit, and I will sing with the understanding also.

block.text: Olsem na bai mi mekim wanem? Mi mas prea long spirit bilong mi na long tingting bilong mi wantaim. Mi mas singim song long spirit bilong mi na long tingting bilong mi wantaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Otherwise if you bless with the spirit, how will he who fills the place of the unlearned say the “Amen” at your giving of thanks? Seeing how he doesn't know what you say.

block.text: Sapos yu no mekim olsem, na long spirit bilong yu tasol yu tenkyu long God, na sapos wanpela man i stap em i no save long dispela toktok yu mekim, orait olsem wanem bai em i save olsem yu tenkyu long God, na em i tok "I tru" long dispela tenkyu bilong yu? Em bai i no inap, long wanem, em i no save long dispela tok yu mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you most certainly give thanks well, but the other person is not built up.

block.text: Tru, yu mekim gutpela tok tenkyu, tasol yu no strongim bel bilong dispela arapela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I thank my God, I speak with other languages more than you all.

block.text: Mi tenkyu long God, long wanem, planti taim mi save mekim tok long narapela tok ples. Mi winim yupela tru long dispela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However in the assembly I would rather speak five words with my understanding, that I might instruct others also, than ten thousand words in another language.

block.text: Tasol taim ol manmeri bilong sios i bung bilong mekim lotu, i gutpela sapos mi mekim 5 -pela hap tok ol arapela i ken klia long en, bai mi ken skulim ol, na maski long mekim 10,000 tok long narapela tok ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Brothers, don't be children in thoughts, yet in malice be babies, but in thoughts be mature.

block.text: Ol brata, yupela i no ken i stap olsem ol pikinini long tingting bilong yupela. Nogat. Long olgeta kain pasin nogut yupela i mas i stap olsem ol liklik pikinini. Tasol tingting bilong yupela i mas i stap olsem tingting bilong ol bikpela man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In the law it is written,

block.text: Long lo bilong God ol i raitim tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “By men of strange languages and by the lips of strangers I will speak to this people. Not even thus will they hear me, says the Lord.”

block.text: "Bikpela i tok olsem, 'Bai mi givim tok long ol long maus bilong ol man bilong narapela tok ples. Tasol bai ol i no laik harim tok bilong mi.' "

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore other languages are for a sign, not to those who believe, but to the unbelieving. Prophesying is for a sign, not to the unbelieving, but to those who believe.

block.text: Olsem na pasin bilong mekim tok long narapela tok ples, em i mak God i givim bilong soim strong bilong em, na em i no soim dispela mak long ol man i bilip pinis long em. Nogat. Em i soim long ol man i no bilip. Tasol pasin bilong autim tok bilong God olsem profet, em i mak God i givim long ol man i bilip. Dispela mak em i no bilong ol man i no bilip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What if therefore the whole assembly is assembled together and all speak with other languages? If unlearned or unbelieving people come in, won't they say that you are crazy?

block.text: Olsem na sapos olgeta manmeri bilong sios i bung wantaim, na yupela olgeta i mekim tok long narapela narapela tok ples, na sapos ol arapela man i kam insait, em ol man i no bilip, orait ol bai i tok olsem yupela i longlong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if all prophesy, and someone unbelieving or unlearned comes in, he is reproved by all, and he is judged by all.

block.text: Tasol sapos yupela olgeta i autim tok profet, na sapos wanpela man i no bilip o narapela man i kam insait, orait tok bilong yupela olgeta bai i sutim bel bilong dispela man, na soim em olsem em i man bilong mekim sin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And thus the secrets of his heart are revealed. So he will fall down on his face and worship God, declaring that God is among you indeed.

block.text: Olgeta tingting nogut i hait i stap long bel bilong en, dispela bai i kamap ples klia. Na em bai i brukim skru na putim pes i go daun long graun, na lotu long God. Na em bai i tokaut olsem, "Tru tumas, God i stap namel long yupela."

ReferenceBlocks.text: What is it then, brothers? When you come together, each one of you has a psalm, has a teaching, has a revelation, has another language, has an interpretation. Let all things be done to build each other up.

block.text: Olsem na, ol brata, taim yupela i bung bilong lotu, yupela i mas mekim wanem? Yupela olgeta i gat wok. Wanpela i gat song na wanpela i gat tok bilong skulim ol arapela na wanpela i gat tok God i bin givim long em, na em i mas autim dispela. Na wanpela i gat tok long narapela tok ples, na wanpela i gat wok bilong tanim dispela tok. Olgeta samting yupela i mekim, yupela i mas mekim bilong strongim sios.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If any man speaks in another language, let it be two, or at the most three, and in turn; and let one interpret.

block.text: Sapos sampela i laik mekim tok long narapela tok ples, tupela o tripela tasol i ken mekim. Em inap. Na ol i no ken mekim tok wantaim. Nogat. Wanpela i mas tok pastaim na narapela bihain long em. Na wanpela man i mas tanim tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if there is no interpreter, let him keep silent in the assembly, and let him speak to himself, and to God.

block.text: Na sapos i no gat man bilong tanim tok, orait man bilong mekim tok long narapela tok ples, em i mas i stap isi na i no ken toktok. Em i ken mekim toktok long em yet na long God tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let the prophets speak, two or three, and let the others discern.

block.text: Na tupela o tripela man bilong autim tok bilong God olsem profet, ol tasol i ken autim tok. Na ol arapela i ken skelim tok bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if a revelation is made to another sitting by, let the first keep silent.

block.text: Na sapos wanpela i sindaun i stap, na God i soim wanpela tok long em, orait man i wok long toktok, em i mas pasim maus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you all can prophesy one by one, that all may learn, and all may be exhorted.

block.text: Long dispela pasin bai yupela olgeta inap autim tok wan wan, bai olgeta man i ken kisim save, na olgeta i ken kisim strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets,

block.text: Ol man bilong autim tok profet, ol i save bosim maus bilong ol yet, na ol i ken autim tok long taim bilong ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God is not the author of confusion, but of peace, as in all the assemblies of the saints.

block.text: God is not the author of confusion, but of peace, as in all the assemblies of the saints.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let your wives keep silent in the assemblies, for it has not been permitted for them to speak; but let them be in subjection, as the law also says.

block.text: Let your wives keep silent in the assemblies, for it has not been permitted for them to speak; but let them be in subjection, as the law also says.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If they desire to learn anything, let them ask their own husbands at home, for it is shameful for a woman to chatter in the assembly.

block.text: Sapos ol i laik save as bilong wanpela tok, orait ol i ken askim man bilong ol yet long haus bilong ol. Sapos meri i mekim tok long taim sios i bung, em i mekim pasin i no stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: What? Was it from you that the word of God went out? Or did it come to you alone?

block.text: Olsem wanem? Tok bilong God i bin kirap long yupela pastaim, a? Yupela tasol i bin kisim tok bilong God, na ol arapela manmeri nogat?

ReferenceBlocks.text: If any man thinks himself to be a prophet, or spiritual, let him recognize the things which I write to you, that they are the commandment of the Lord.

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i ting God i bin givim em wok bilong autim tok profet, o em i ting em yet i gat tingting bilong Holi Spirit, orait em i mas save, dispela tok mi raitim long yupela em i lo bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if anyone is ignorant, let him be ignorant.

block.text: Na sapos wanpela man i no orait long dispela tok, orait yupela i no ken lukim em olsem man bilong autim tok profet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, brothers, desire earnestly to prophesy, and don't forbid speaking with other languages.

block.text: Olsem na, ol brata bilong mi, yupela i mas laikim tumas long autim tok profet, na yupela i no ken tambuim pasin bilong mekim tok long kain kain tok ples.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let all things be done decently and in order.

block.text: Tasol yupela i mas bihainim stret ol gutpela pasin bilong lotu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 15
Now brothers, I want to remind you of the Good News which I preached to you, which also you received, in which you also stand.

block.text: Ol brata, mi laik kirapim tingting bilong yupela gen long gutnius mi bin autim long yupela. Yupela i kisim pinis dispela gutnius, na yupela i save sanap strong long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By this gospel you are saved if you hold firmly the word which I preached to you. Otherwise, you have believed in vain.

block.text: Na sapos yupela i holimpas ol tok bilong gutnius mi bin autim long yupela, orait long dispela gutnius tasol God i save kisim bek yupela. Em sapos yupela i no bin bilip nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I delivered to you first of all that which I also received: that Christ died for our sins according to the Scriptures,

block.text: Bikpela tok tru mi bin givim long yupela, em dispela tok mi yet mi bin kisim bipo. Em i olsem. Krais i bin i dai bilong rausim olgeta sin bilong yumi, olsem tok i stap long buk bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that he was buried, that he was raised on the third day according to the Scriptures,

block.text: Na ol i putim em long matmat, na long de namba 3 em i kirap bek, olsem tok i stap long buk bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and that he appeared to Cephas, then to the twelve.

block.text: Na bihain em i kamap long Pita, na bihain gen long ol 12 -pela aposel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he appeared to over five hundred brothers at once, most of whom remain until now, but some have also fallen asleep.

block.text: Na bihain planti brata wantaim i lukim em, namba bilong ol i winim 500 . Planti moa bilong ol dispela brata i stap yet, tasol sampela i dai pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he appeared to James, then to all the apostles.

block.text: Na bihain Jems i lukim em. Na bihain gen olgeta aposel i lukim em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Last of all, as to the child born at the wrong time, he appeared to me also.

block.text: Na bihain tru long ol, em i kamap long ai bilong mi tu. Mi olsem pikinini, mama i karim nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I am the least of the apostles, who is not worthy to be called an apostle, because I persecuted the assembly of God.

block.text: Mi liklik tumas namel long ol aposel. Na i no inap ol man i kolim mi aposel, long wanem, pastaim mi bin wok long bagarapim sios bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But by the grace of God I am what I am. His grace which was bestowed on me was not futile, but I worked more than all of them; yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.

block.text: Tasol God i marimari long mi, na em i mekim mi i kamap man olsem nau mi stap. Na marimari bilong en long mi, em i no lus nating. Nogat tru. Mi save wok strong tumas, na mi winim ol arapela aposel. Tasol i no mi yet i mekim ol dispela wok. Nogat. God i marimari long mi na givim strong long mi bilong mekim ol dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Whether then it is I or they, so we preach, and so you believed.

block.text: Tasol maski mi mekim o ol arapela aposel i mekim, mipela olgeta i save autim dispela tok bilong Jisas i dai na i kirap bek. Na yupela i harim na bilipim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now if Christ is preached, that he has been raised from the dead, how do some among you say that there is no resurrection of the dead?

block.text: Oltaim mipela i save autim tok long Krais i bin i dai na God i kirapim em bek. Na bilong wanem sampela namel long yupela i save tok olsem, "Man i dai pinis, em i no inap kirap bek"?

ReferenceBlocks.text: But if there is no resurrection of the dead, neither has Christ been raised.

block.text: Sapos i tru ol man i dai pinis, ol i no inap kirap bek, orait yumi mas tok olsem, "God i no bin kirapim Krais."

ReferenceBlocks.text: If Christ has not been raised, then our preaching is in vain, and your faith also is in vain.

block.text: Na sapos i tru God i no bin kirapim Krais, orait dispela tok mipela i save autim, em i samting nating, na bilip bilong yupela em tu i samting nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, we are found false witnesses of God, because we testified about God that he raised up Christ, whom he didn't raise up. That is, if it is so that the dead are not raised.

block.text: Na sapos i olsem, orait mipela i kamap olsem ol man i tok giaman long samting God i mekim. Long wanem, mipela i bin tokaut klia olsem God i bin kirapim Krais. Tasol sapos i tru God i no save kirapim ol man i dai pinis, orait em i no bin kirapim Krais tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For if the dead aren't raised, neither has Christ been raised.

block.text: Yes, sapos i tru God i no save kirapim ol man i dai pinis, orait yumi mas tok olsem, "God i no bin kirapim Krais."

ReferenceBlocks.text: If Christ has not been raised, your faith is vain; you are still in your sins.

block.text: Na sapos i tru God i no bin kirapim Krais, orait bilip bilong yupela i no inap helpim yupela. Yupela i stap yet long sin bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they also who are fallen asleep in Christ have perished.

block.text: Na ol man i bin bilip long Krais na i dai pinis, ol tu i lus pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we have only hoped in Christ in this life, we are of all men most pitiable.

block.text: Yumi bilip long Krais na wetim em i mekim gut long yumi. Tasol sapos yumi wetim ol samting yumi bai kisim long laip bilong dispela graun tasol, orait tru tumas yumi tarangu lain stret, na yumi winim ol arapela tarangu lain bilong dispela graun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now Christ has been raised from the dead. He became the first fruits of those who are asleep.

block.text: Tasol i no olsem. Nogat. Krais i dai pinis, na tru tumas God i bin kirapim em bek. Em i kirap paslain long ol arapela man i dai pinis, olsem namba wan kaikai i redi long gaden.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For since death came by man, the resurrection of the dead also came by man.

block.text: Wanpela man i bin kamapim pasin bilong i dai, na olsem tasol wanpela man i bin kamapim pasin bilong kirap bek.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For as in Adam all die, so also in Christ all will be made alive.

block.text: I olsem. Olgeta man bilong lain bilong Adam ol i save dai. Na olsem tasol olgeta man bilong lain bilong Krais bai ol i kisim laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But each in his own order: Christ the first fruits, then those who are Christ's, at his coming.

block.text: Tasol yumi olgeta bai yumi kirap bek na kisim laip long taim bilong yumi yet. Namba wan em Krais. Na bihain, taim em i kam bek, yumi olgeta lain bilong en bai yumi kirap bek.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then the end comes, when he will deliver up the Kingdom to God, even the Father; when he will have abolished all rule and all authority and power.

block.text: Long dispela taim bai olgeta samting i pinis. Na bai Krais i pinisim olgeta gavman na olgeta strongpela spirit na olgeta samting i gat strong, na bai em i putim kingdom long han bilong God Papa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he must reign until he has put all his enemies under his feet.

block.text: Long wanem, Krais i mas i stap king i go inap em i daunim olgeta birua bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The last enemy that will be abolished is death.

block.text: Em i pinisim pinis olgeta arapela birua, orait em bai i pinisim dai tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For, “He put all things in subjection under his feet.” But when he says, “All things are put in subjection,” it is evident that he is excepted who subjected all things to him.

block.text: Buk bilong God i tok olsem, "God i bin putim olgeta samting i stap aninit long em." Dispela tok i tok olsem God yet i mekim dispela wok bilong putim olgeta samting aninit long Krais. Olsem na yumi save God yet i no i stap aninit long Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When all things have been subjected to him, then the Son will also himself be subjected to him who subjected all things to him. That God may be all in all.

block.text: Na bihain, taim olgeta samting i stap aninit long Krais pinis, orait Pikinini Bilong God bai i putim em yet aninit long God. Pastaim God i bin putim olgeta samting aninit long Pikinini bilong en, tasol taim Pikinini Bilong God i putim em yet aninit long God, orait God bai i stap het tru bilong olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Or else what will they do who are baptized for the dead? If the dead aren't raised at all, why then are they baptized for the dead?

block.text: Sapos ol man i dai pinis, ol i no inap kirap bek, orait long wanem as tru sampela man i save kisim baptais bilong helpim ol man i dai pinis? Sapos ol i no inap kirap bek, orait bilong wanem ol man i save kisim baptais bilong helpim ol?

ReferenceBlocks.text: Why do we also stand in jeopardy every hour?

block.text: Na olsem wanem long mipela? Planti man i save kros long mipela long dispela wok mipela i mekim, na oltaim ol i laik bagarapim mipela. Sapos ol man i dai pinis ol i no inap kirap bek, orait bilong wanem mipela i no lusim dispela wok bilong raun na tokim ol manmeri olsem, man i dai pinis, em i kirap bek?

ReferenceBlocks.text: I affirm, by the boasting in you which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord, I die daily.

block.text: Ol brata, mi tok tru tumas, olgeta de mi pilim olsem mi dai pinis. Yumi olgeta i stap long Krais Jisas na mi save amamas tru long yupela, olsem na mi no haitim dispela tok long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If I fought with animals at Ephesus for human purposes, what does it profit me? If the dead are not raised, then “let us eat and drink, for tomorrow we die.”

block.text: Sapos yupela i ting mi bihainim laik bilong mi yet na mi mekim dispela wok, orait yupela tokim mi. Mi ting long kisim wanem samting na mi pait long ol wel animal long Efesus? Sapos ol man i dai pinis ol i no inap kirap bek, orait mobeta "yumi kaikai na dring, long wanem, tumora bai yumi dai."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don't be deceived! “Evil companionships corrupt good morals.”

block.text: Yupela i no ken larim ol arapela man i giamanim yupela. Yupela i save long dispela tok, "Sapos yumi poroman wantaim ol man nogut, bai ol i bagarapim gutpela pasin bilong yumi."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Wake up righteously, and don't sin, for some have no knowledge of God. I say this to your shame.

block.text: Yupela i mas lusim longlong pasin na tingting stret. Yupela i no ken mekim sin moa. Yupela harim. Sampela bilong yupela ol i no save yet long God. Mi mekim dispela tok bai yupela i ken sem long pasin bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But someone will say, “How are the dead raised?” and, “With what kind of body do they come?”

block.text: Ating wanpela man bai i askim olsem, "Ol man i dai pinis, bai ol i kirap bek olsem wanem? Bai ol i gat wanem kain bodi taim ol i kirap bek?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: You foolish one, that which you yourself sow is not made alive unless it dies.

block.text: Dispela em wanem kain kranki tok? Yu save, taim yu planim pikinini bilong wit samting, dispela pikinini i mas i dai pastaim, na bai em i kisim laip.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That which you sow, you don't sow the body that will be, but a bare grain, maybe of wheat, or of some other kind.

block.text: Na dispela pikinini yu planim, maski em i pikinini wit o wanem samting, em i pikinini nating, na em i no luk wankain olsem dispela wit samting bai i kamap bihain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But God gives it a body even as it pleased him, and to each seed a body of its own.

block.text: Na long laik bilong em yet, God i save givim han na skin na ol lip samting long olgeta kain pikinini kaikai na gras na diwai samting, na dispela i olsem bodi ol i kisim. Olsem na olgeta i save kisim bodi i narakain long ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All flesh is not the same flesh, but there is one flesh of men, another flesh of animals, another of fish, and another of birds.

block.text: Olgeta bodi i no wankain. Nogat. I gat wanpela kain bodi bilong man, na narapela kain bodi bilong ol abus, na narapela kain bodi bilong ol pisin, na narapela kain bodi bilong ol pis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There are also celestial bodies, and terrestrial bodies; but the glory of the celestial differs from that of the terrestrial.

block.text: Ol samting bilong skai i gat kain bodi bilong ol, na ol samting bilong graun tu i gat kain bodi bilong ol. Tasol bilas bilong ol samting bilong skai em i wanpela kain, na bilas bilong ol samting bilong graun em i narapela kain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There is one glory of the sun, another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars; for one star differs from another star in glory.

block.text: San i gat wanpela kain bilas, na mun i gat narapela kain bilas, na ol sta i gat narapela kain bilas. Na ol wan wan sta tu i gat kain bilas bilong ol yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So also is the resurrection of the dead. It is sown in corruption; it is raised in incorruption.

block.text: Pasin bilong man i dai pinis na i kirap bek, em i olsem tasol. Bodi yumi planim, em i save bagarap. Bodi i kirap bek, em i no inap bagarap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is sown in dishonor; it is raised in glory. It is sown in weakness; it is raised in power.

block.text: Bodi yumi planim, em i samting nogut. Bodi i kirap bek, em i gutpela tru. Bodi yumi planim, em i no gat strong. Bodi i kirap bek, em i gat strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is sown a natural body; it is raised a spiritual body. There is a natural body and there is also a spiritual body.
So also it is written,

block.text: Bodi yumi planim, em i bilong graun. Bodi i kirap bek, em i bilong heven.
Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The first man, Adam, became a living soul.”

block.text: "Namba wan man, Adam, i bin kisim laip."

ReferenceBlocks.text: The last Adam became a life-giving spirit.

block.text: Tasol narapela Adam i kamap bihain tru, em i bin kamap spirit bilong givim laip long man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However that which is spiritual isn't first, but that which is natural, then that which is spiritual.

block.text: Laip bilong spirit i no save kamap pastaim. Nogat. Laip bilong dispela graun i save kamap pastaim. Na laip bilong spirit i save kamap bihain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The first man is of the earth, made of dust. The second man is the Lord from heaven.

block.text: Namba wan Adam em i bilong graun. God i bin wokim em long graun tasol. Namba 2 Adam em i bilong heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As is the one made of dust, such are those who are also made of dust; and as is the heavenly, such are they also that are heavenly.

block.text: Olgeta man bilong graun, ol i wankain olsem dispela man bilong graun. Na olgeta man bilong heven bai i kamap wankain olsem dispela man bilong heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As we have borne the image of those made of dust, let's also bear the image of the heavenly.

block.text: Nau yumi stap wankain olsem dispela man bilong graun, na olsem tasol bihain bai yumi stap wankain olsem dispela man bilong heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now I say this, brothers, that flesh and blood can't inherit the Kingdom of God; neither does corruption inherit incorruption.

block.text: Ol brata, mi tok stret long yupela, man bilong dispela graun em i no inap i go insait long kingdom bilong God na kisim ol gutpela samting bilong en. Na samting bilong bagarap em i no inap kisim samting i no save bagarap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, I tell you a mystery. We will not all sleep, but we will all be changed,

block.text: Yupela harim. Mi laik autim wanpela tok hait long yupela. Bai yumi olgeta i no i dai. Tasol bai yumi olgeta i senis na i kamap narakain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trumpet. For the trumpet will sound, and the dead will be raised incorruptible, and we will be changed.

block.text: Dispela bai i kamap wantu tasol, long taim bilong las biugel i krai. Yes, biugel bai i krai, na ol man i dai pinis bai i kirap, na ol i no inap bagarap moa. Na yumi man i no i dai yet, yumi bai i senis na i kamap narakain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal must put on immortality.

block.text: I olsem. Dispela bodi i save bagarap, em i mas senis na i stap gut oltaim. Dispela bodi i save dai, em i mas senis na i stap laip oltaim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when this corruptible will have put on incorruption, and this mortal will have put on immortality, then what is written will happen:

block.text: Tru, dispela bodi i save bagarap, em bai i senis na i stap gut oltaim. Na dispela bodi i save dai, em bai i senis na i stap laip oltaim. Long dispela taim tok i stap long buk bilong God, em bai i kamap tru. Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Death is swallowed up in victory.”

block.text: "God i winim pait na em i pinisim dai tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “O death, where is your victory? O death where is your sting?”

block.text: Dai, we stap strong bilong yu long daunim ol man? Dai, we stap spia bilong yu bilong bagarapim ol man?"

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sting of death is sin, and the power of sin is the law.

block.text: Spia bilong dai em sin tasol, na sin em i kisim strong bilong en long lo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But thanks be to God, who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: Tasol yumi tenkyu long God. Long strong bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais, God i save strongim yumi na yumi winim pait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore, my beloved brothers, be steadfast, immovable. Be always abounding in the Lord's work, because you know that your labor is not in vain in the Lord.

block.text: Olsem na, ol brata tru bilong mi, yupela i mas i stap strong, na i no ken surik liklik. Yupela i save olsem, hatwok yupela i save mekim long Bikpela, em bai i no inap lus nating. Olsem na oltaim yupela i mas wok strong long mekim wok bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 1 CORINTHIANS CHP 16
Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I commanded the assemblies of Galatia, you do likewise.

block.text: Nau mi laik tok long dispela mani yupela i laik bungim bilong givim long ol manmeri bilong God i stap long Jerusalem. Mi bin soim rot bilong mekim dispela wok long ol sios bilong provins Galesia, na yupela tu i mas mekim wankain pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: On the first day of the week, let each one of you save, as he may prosper, that no collections be made when I come.

block.text: Long olgeta Sande yupela olgeta wan wan i mas tilim mani yupela i bin kisim long dispela wik, na putim hap i stap long ol haus bilong yupela yet, na bai mani i ken kamap planti liklik. Olsem na taim mi kam, yupela bai i no gat wok bilong painim mani bilong givim ol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I arrive, I will send whoever you approve with letters to carry your gracious gift to Jerusalem.

block.text: Taim mi kamap, orait yupela yet i mas makim sampela man bilong karim dispela presen bilong yupela i go long Jerusalem. Na bai mi givim pas long ol na salim ol i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If it is appropriate for me to go also, they will go with me.

block.text: Na sapos mi ting i gutpela long mi tu mi go, orait bai ol i ken i go wantaim mi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I will come to you when I have passed through Macedonia, for I am passing through Macedonia.

block.text: Mi bai i go lukim ol lain i stap long provins Masedonia pastaim, na bihain bai mi kam kamap long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But with you it may be that I will stay, or even winter, that you may send me on my journey wherever I go.

block.text: Na ating bai mi stap liklik wantaim yupela. Mi no save, ating bai mi stap wantaim yupela inap long taim bilong kol na strongpela win i pinis. Na taim mi laik i go long narapela ples, orait yupela i ken helpim mi long i go.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I do not wish to see you now in passing, but I hope to stay a while with you, if the Lord permits.

block.text: Mi no laik i stap sotpela taim tasol wantaim yupela. Nogat. Sapos Bikpela i larim mi, mi laik i stap longtaim liklik wantaim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I will stay at Ephesus until Pentecost,
for a great and effective door has opened to me, and there are many adversaries.

block.text: Tasol mi laik i stap hia long taun Efesus inap long de bilong Pentikos,
long wanem, God i opim rot pinis long mi, na mi gat bikpela wok bilong helpim planti manmeri i kamap Kristen. Na tu, i gat planti man i birua long mipela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now if Timothy comes, see that he is with you without fear, for he does the work of the Lord, as I also do.

block.text: Sapos Timoti i kamap long yupela, orait yupela i mas helpim em long i stap bel isi namel long yupela, na i no ken pret. Yupela harim. Em i save mekim wok bilong Bikpela, olsem mi yet mi mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore let no one despise him. But set him forward on his journey in peace, that he may come to me; for I expect him with the brothers.

block.text: Nogut sampela bilong yupela i lukim em i olsem samting nating na i givim baksait long em. Yupela i mas helpim em long taim em i laik lusim yupela na larim em i go wantaim bel isi, na bai em i ken i kam bek long mi. Mi wetim em long i kam wantaim ol brata.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now concerning Apollos, the brother, I strongly urged him to come to you with the brothers; and it was not at all his desire to come now; but he will come when he has an opportunity.

block.text: Na tok bilong brata bilong yumi Apolos, em i olsem. Planti taim mi bin tok strong long em i mas i go wantaim ol arapela brata long taim ol i kam lukim yupela. Tasol em i no laik tru long i kam nau. Bihain, sapos em yet i pilim em i gutpela taim long i kam, orait em bai i kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Watch! Stand firm in the faith! Be courageous! Be strong!

block.text: Yupela i mas was gut na sanap strong long bilip. Yupela i mas i stap strong, na yupela i no ken pret long wanpela samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let all that you do be done in love.

block.text: Na yupela i mas givim bel bilong yupela long God na long ol man, na long dispela pasin yupela i mas mekim olgeta samting yupela i save mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: (You know the house of Stephanas, that it is the first fruits of Achaia, and that they have set themselves to serve the saints).

block.text: Ol brata, yupela i save long ol lain bilong Stefanas. Ol i bin kamap Kristen paslain long ol arapela lain i stap long provins Akaia. Na long laik bilong ol yet ol i bin kisim wok bilong helpim ol manmeri bilong God. Mi laik strong long yupela

ReferenceBlocks.text: I ask you that you also be in subjection to leadersa such as these, and to everyone who helps in the work and labors.

block.text: i mas i stap aninit long ol dispela kain man, na long olgeta man i save helpim ol na mekim dispela kain wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I rejoice at the coming of Stephanas, Fortunatus, and Achaicus; for that which was lacking on your part, they supplied.

block.text: Stefanas na Fortunatus na Akaikus i bin i kam long mi, na mi amamas long lukim ol, long wanem, yupela olgeta i no inap i kam lukim mi

ReferenceBlocks.text: For they refreshed my spirit and yours. Therefore acknowledge those who are like that.

block.text: na ol i bin mekim isi bel bilong mi, na bel bilong yupela tu. Yupela i mas amamas long ol dispela kain man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The assemblies of Asia greet you. Aquila and Priscilla greet you much in the Lord, together with the assembly that is in their house.

block.text: Ol sios long provins Esia i givim gude long yupela. Akwila na Prisila wantaim ol manmeri bilong sios i save bung long haus bilong tupela, ol i givim bikpela gude tru long yupela long nem bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the brothers greet you. Greet one another with a holy kiss.

block.text: Olgeta brata i givim gude long yupela. Long pasin bilong yumi ol manmeri bilong God, yupela olgeta wan wan i mas givim kis long ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This greeting is by me, Paul, with my own hand.

block.text: Mi Pol, long han bilong mi yet mi raitim dispela gude long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If any man doesn't love the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be accursed. Come, Lord!

block.text: Sapos wanpela man i no laik givim bel bilong em long Bikpela, orait em i ken bagarap. Bikpela, yu kam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

block.text: Marimari bilong Bikpela Jisas em i ken i stap wantaim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: My love to all of you in Christ Jesus. Amen.

block.text: Long Krais Jisas mi givim bel bilong mi long yupela olgeta.
